뉴스제목: Tech YouTuber unlocks native PS3 emulation on PS5 hardware
본문: A tech YouTuber recently experimented with PS5 hardware to prove it can run PS3 games. Lowest Logan’s experiment used an AMD BC-250 mining card and was able to run games like Gran Turismo 5 Prologue. The YouTuber also noted that game performance could be improved through optimization. Game emulation has remained a contentious area within the gaming world, with many gamers opting for PCs to emulate games across the board. However, with many tech developments, console gamers have joined in on the fun, with PlayStation emulation steadily growing and techies performing experiments. In one such case, a YouTuber experimented using underclocked hardware to debunk beliefs such as those stating that PS5 cannot run PS3 games. YouTuber proves that the PS5 can run PS3 games A tech YouTuber named Lowest Logan successfully used PS5 hardware to run PS3 games in a groundbreaking experiment. Logan used the AMD BC-250 mining card, which has a system-on-chip (SoC) similar to the PS5’s native chip but with limited CPU and GPU capabilities. The chip has six cores and 12 threads, and only 24 out of the original 32 GPU compute units are active. The BC-250 chip was limited to 450MHz clock speed with the Youtuber’s setup using 16 GB of GDDR6 memory. The YouTuber’s experiment also used RPCS3, the popular open-source PS3 emulator compatible with Windows, macOS, Linux, and FreeBSD. Logan’s experiment proved that the PS5’s setup can run PS3 games built using the complex CELL-based model by converting them to x86-compatible instructions. Logan’s improvised setup ran games such as Gran Turismo 5 Prologue, Watch Dogs, and LittleBigPlanet 2 at 60fps. The experiment was able to run the games with occasional shader compilation stutters being the only major issue despite increasing the resolution to 1440p. Logan’s experiment upstages previous attempts at backward compatibility on Sony consoles, which left many believing it was impossible. Watch Dogs notably had more glitches than the other games. The tech YouTuber attributed the extra glitches to the game’s original PS3 optimization issues. Logan reignited backward compatibility debates After his successful experiment, Logan reignited debates about the PS5’s untapped potential for backward compatibility without requiring cloud streaming. The YouTuber’s approach overcame many technical and software limitations while also using an underpowered setup to run PS3 games. Gamers pointed out that Logan’s experiment disproved Sony’s initial stance that implied that native PS3 emulation on the PS5 is not feasible due to technical barriers and high costs. Many gamers argued that Sony’s staff are not as competent or motivated when working towards providing backward compatibility for previous PlayStation consoles. The gamers stated that the problem was not the hardware but rather the PS3’s software issues that Sony was unwilling to address. Some gamers stated that Sony should do a better job since most PS1, PS2, and PS3 games could be properly emulated using a PC or other consoles such as the Steam Deck. 뉴스제목: XRP price rises ahead of RLUSD launch, but a reversal is possible
본문: The XRP price continued rising, becoming one of the best-performing large-cap cryptocurrencies in the market. Ripple ( XRP ) surged by over 12%, extending an uptrend that began on December 10 when the token bottomed at $1.9065. The rally came after Brad Garlinghouse, Ripple’s CEO, announced that the company would launch the RLUSD stablecoin on Dec. 17 . The stablecoin will initially debut on major exchanges such as Uphold, Bitstamp, MoonPay, and others. The launch follows Ripple developers receiving approval from New York authorities after months of regulatory review. Ripple Labs aims for RLUSD to become a significant player in the stablecoin industry by offering enterprise-grade solutions. Additionally, Ripple hopes RLUSD will complement XRP to boost cross-border transaction volumes in the coming months. Still, RLUSD faces substantial risks ahead. The biggest risk is that it may not gain traction among users after all. Some stablecoins launched by big companies have failed to become popular in the past. For example, Justin Sun’s USDD stablecoin’s market cap has remained around $740 million since its launch in 2022. Similarly, PayPal USD, which was launched in 2023 by PayPal, has struggled and has $458 million in assets. On the other hand, Tether ( USDT ) has continued to grow its market share as its market cap has jumped to over $140 billion. It has become the most used stablecoin in the industry, with a market dominance of over 66%. You might also like: Bitcoin is “under-exposed” to corporate adoption, says VanEck’s Matthew Sigel XRP price chart points to potential risks XRP price chart | Source: crypto.news The other potential risk for the Ripple price is that users may sell the news. This is a situation where users buy an asset in anticipation of a major event and then sell it when it happens. A good example of this is what happened after the last Bitcoin ( BTC ) halving in April. Bitcoin rose ahead of the halving and then retreated after it happened. Another technical risk for XRP is a developing double-top pattern at $2.90. A double-top is a bearish chart formation that often precedes a price pullback. In this case, XRP may hit $2.90 and then retrace to its neckline at $1.90. Furthermore, the coin could experience mean reversion, where the price falls back toward its key moving averages. Currently, XRP trades about 60% above the 50-day moving average, increasing the likelihood of a correction. Conversely, a move above the double-top resistance at $2.90 would invalidate the bearish outlook and could propel XRP toward the $5 level. You might also like: Ripple CTO warns of RLUSD launch volatility, says “don’t FOMO into a stablecoin”

뉴스제목: EU Parliament Member pushes for a strategic Bitcoin reserve and says ‘no’ to digital euro
본문: French Parliament Member, Sarah Knafo, urges the EU to ‘bet on Bitcoin’ by building national strategic Bitcoin reserves while rejecting the central bank’s plan for a digital euro. In a video shared on her X account on Dec. 17, Knafo delivered a speech in parliament, calling for European nations to start building national Bitcoin ( BTC ) reserves, develop the crypto mining industry and stop hiking up taxes on crypto holders. “It’s time to bet on freedom, it is time for our states to bet on Bitcoin. To build national strategic reserves. It is time to develop the mining industry,” said Knafo. She took the opportunity to oppose the European Central Bank’s plan to create a digital euro , a mechanism that she believes would only give the bank more power over people’s finances due to how centralized the digital euro was. “We do not want this dystopian world where a European bureaucrat will be able to prohibit certain transactions and even eliminate us from the banking system with a click for a simple comment made on social media or for stating an opinion that disagrees with them.” Sarah Knafo, Member of the European Parliament In the beginning of her speech, she cited El Salvador’s decision to invest in cryptocurrency back in 2021 and Donald Trump’s commitment to establishing a strategic Bitcoin reserve in the U.S. as key examples for how the world has shifted towards decentralized finance. “The whole world is now preparing to take advantage of this decentralized finance revolution. Donald Trump to build strategic Bitcoin reserve for the U.S. Jerome Powell, the Chairman of the U.S. Federal Reserve is now talking about digital gold. Bitcoin is exploding,” said Knafo, referring to Bitcoin’s major milestone of surpassing the $100,000 threshold for the first time in history and the U.S Fed Chairman’s comments that compare Bitcoin to gold. Read more: ECB official calls for urgency on digital euro amid global CBDC race She criticized the EU over their poor decision of still hanging onto the traditional finance systems that are much more prone to economic crises such as inflation and deficits. Knafo claimed that the EU “is squandering our money on unbelievable mismanagement” because it refuses to turn to crypto as a more reliable alternative to store its national funds. “It is time for a paradigm shift. It is time to protect our people from inflation and the poor economic choices of our states,” she stated. In the past few months, several nations have been leaning towards plans of building a Bitcoin reserve. On Dec. 16, Donald Trump reaffirmed his plans to build a strategic Bitcoin reserve as part of his plan to make America the “crypto capital.” In addition, states across the country are in the process of passing Bitcoin reserve bills, including Texas, Alabama and Pennsylvania. Prior to that, lawmakers in both Japan and Russia have urged their governments to consider establishing a national Bitcoin reserve to protect the national funds of their respective nations. On Nov. 26, Brazilian legislators in the Chamber of Deputies proposed a Bitcoin bill that would limit Brazil’s reserves to approximately $18.5 billion worth of Bitcoin. Read more: CZ highlights how governments are leaning towards BTC strategic reserves

뉴스제목: How Central Bank Digital Currencies Are Disrupting Traditional Banking Systems
본문: Central Bank Digital Currencies (CBDCs) are transforming the financial landscape, offering a digital version of a nation’s fiat currency that is issued and regulated by central banks. Unlike decentralized cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, CBDCs aim to blend the stability of traditional money with the speed and convenience of digital payments. As part of this evolution, innovative blockchain projects like Lightchain Tokens (LCAI) are stepping into the spotlight. Don’t miss the chance to participate in the Lightchain AI Presale , where cutting-edge solutions are shaping the future of secure, decentralized technologies. As countries race to meet the growing demand for faster and more secure transactions, CBDCs are emerging as potential disruptors to traditional banking systems. They offer advantages such as reduced transaction costs, improved payment efficiency, and greater financial inclusion. However, their rollout introduces critical challenges around privacy, monetary policy, and the role of private banks. In this article, we’ll dive into the mechanics of CBDCs, their benefits and limitations, and what they could mean for financial institutions and consumers. We’ll also explore how blockchain innovations, like Lightchain Tokens (LCAI) , are paving the way for decentralized systems that could either complement or challenge the rise of CBDCs. What are Central Bank Digital Currencies? Central Bank Digital Currencies (CBDCs) are digital forms of a nation's fiat currency, issued and regulated by the central bank. Unlike cryptocurrencies, CBDCs are centralized and represent a direct liability of the central bank, ensuring stability and trust. They are designed to complement physical cash, providing a digital alternative for transactions and payments. CBDCs can be categorized into two types. retail and wholesale. Retail CBDCs are intended for use by the general public, facilitating everyday transactions, while wholesale CBDCs are designed for financial institutions to streamline large-scale interbank transfers and settlements. The implementation of CBDCs aims to enhance payment efficiency, promote financial inclusion, and provide a secure, government-backed digital payment option. As of 2023, numerous central banks worldwide are exploring or piloting CBDCs to adapt to the evolving digital economy and maintain monetary sovereignty. How Do CBDCs Work? Each country may have its own unique approach to implementing CBDCs, but in general, they work similarly to traditional fiat currencies. The main difference is that CBDCs are entirely digital and operate on a blockchain or distributed ledger technology (DLT) platform. This allows for real-time, secure transactions, with the central bank acting as the intermediary. Consumers can hold their CBDCs in digital wallets provided by commercial banks or directly through the central bank. Transactions using CBDCs can be conducted online or offline, making them easily accessible and convenient for everyday use. Central banks may also have control over the supply of CBDCs, allowing them to implement monetary policies more effectively. They may also have the ability to monitor transactions and combat illegal activities like money laundering. The Role of Lightchain AI in the CBDC Landscape Lightchain AI is poised to transform the Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC) landscape by integrating artificial intelligence (AI) with blockchain technology. Its Proof of Intelligence (PoI) consensus mechanism enhances transaction security by validating operations through AI-driven computations, ensuring robust protection against fraud and cyber threats. The platform's Artificial Intelligence Virtual Machine (AIVM) facilitates scalable solutions for centralized digital currencies, enabling efficient processing of high-volume transactions essential for CBDC implementation. By merging AI with blockchain, Lightchain AI offers a secure, scalable, and efficient framework for central banks exploring digital currency issuance, potentially revolutionizing the future of digital finance. Potential Impact on Traditional Banking Systems The introduction of Central Bank Digital Currencies (CBDCs) could significantly impact traditional banking systems. One primary concern is the potential for bank disintermediation, where customers might prefer holding funds in CBDCs over traditional bank deposits, perceiving them as safer or more convenient. This shift could reduce the deposit base of commercial banks, affecting their ability to lend and manage liquidity. To mitigate such risks, central banks might implement measures like limiting individual CBDC holdings or ensuring that CBDCs are non-interest-bearing, making them less attractive as a savings vehicle compared to bank deposits. Additionally, the coexistence of CBDCs and traditional bank money necessitates functional consistency to prevent fragmentation in payment systems. Establishing common operational characteristics across all forms of regulated digital money is essential to maintain stability and public confidence in the financial system. Lightchain Tokens (LCAI) A Disruptive Force in the CBDC Landscape Lightchain AI is a blockchain ecosystem that integrates artificial intelligence (AI) to enhance scalability, privacy, and decentralization. Its Proof of Intelligence (PoI) consensus mechanism rewards nodes for performing AI computations, promoting efficient and secure processing of large data volumes. The Artificial Intelligence Virtual Machine (AIVM) enables real-time AI computations on-chain, supporting applications across various industries. While Lightchain AI offers innovative solutions within the blockchain and AI sectors, there is no direct evidence to suggest it has a disruptive impact on the Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC) landscape. CBDCs are digital forms of a nation's fiat currency, issued and regulated by central banks, focusing on enhancing payment efficiency and financial inclusion. Therefore, while Lightchain AI contributes to advancements in blockchain technology, its role as a disruptive force in the CBDC landscape remains unsubstantiated. How Lightchain Tokens Presale Is The Oppurtunity You Don't Want To Miss Lightchain AI's presale presents a unique opportunity for investors to engage with a pioneering project at the intersection of artificial intelligence and blockchain technology. By participating in the presale, investors can acquire LCAI tokens at an early stage, potentially maximizing returns as the platform develops and gains market traction. The presale has already garnered significant attention, raising over $2.2 million, indicating strong investor confidence in the project's vision and potential. The LCAI token serves multiple functions within the Lightchain AI ecosystem, including payments for AI services, staking for governance participation, and unlocking premium features. Investing in the presale allows early adopters to support the development of a decentralized AI platform that aims to revolutionize various industries by enhancing scalability, privacy, and efficiency. However, as with all investments, it's crucial to conduct thorough research and consider the inherent risks associated with early-stage projects in the volatile cryptocurrency market. The Future of Banking in a CBDC-Driven World And Lightchain AI's Role As central banks worldwide explore and implement CBDCs, the future of banking is likely to be heavily influenced by these digital currencies. They have the potential to enhance payment efficiency, promote financial inclusion, and provide a secure alternative to traditional forms of currency. However, their implementation will also impact traditional banking systems, potentially leading to disintermediation and requiring regulatory measures for stability. In this evolving landscape, Lightchain AI presents a unique opportunity as a pioneering project at the intersection of artificial intelligence and blockchain technology. While its role in the CBDC landscape remains unclear, its innovative solutions have garnered significant attention and investment, positioning it as a disruptor in various industries. https://lightchain.ai https://lightchain.ai/lightchain-whitepaper.pdf https://x.com/LightchainAI https://t.me/LightchainProtocol Disclaimer: This is a sponsored article and is for informational purposes only. var idNotMatchTosubscribe = document.getElementById('subscribe_' + templateIdStr); // Check if elements exist before applying display changes if (idNotMatchTounsubscribe) { idNotMatchTounsubscribe.style.display = "none"; } if (idNotMatchTosubscribe) { idNotMatchTosubscribe.style.display = "none"; } } } else { console.log("storeallcategory is not an array."); } }, error: function(xhr, status, error) { console.error("AJAX request failed:", status, error); " + document.cookie; let parts = value.split("; " + name + "="); if (parts.length == 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift(); } // Get user token from cookies const userToken = getCookie('user_token'); if (subscribewithoutData === 'true' && userToken) { // Call the modal function with the category ID subscribed_popupmodal(subscribe_clicked_cat_id); // Remove the flag and category ID from localStorage localStorage.removeItem('subscribe_without_Login'); localStorage.removeItem('subscribe_clicked_id'); } }); /************************** update susbcriber content **************************** */ function initializeSubscriptionButton() { var initialListItems = document.querySelectorAll('.subscription-options input[type="checkbox"]'); initialListItems.forEach(function(item) { console.log(item.checked, 'Initial Checkbox checked status'); }); var listItems = document.querySelectorAll('.subscription-options li'); if (listItems.length === 0) return; var anyActive = false; listItems.forEach(function(item) { var checkbox = item.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { if (checkbox.checked) { item.classList.add('active'); anyActive = true; // Set anyActive to true } else { item.classList.remove('active'); // Remove 'active' class if checkbox is unchecked } } }); } function updateButtonText(anyActive) { var subscribeButtonSpan = document.querySelector('.subscribe-submit .changeBtnText'); if (subscribeButtonSpan) { if (anyActive) { subscribeButtonSpan.textContent = 'Subscribe Now'; } else { subscribeButtonSpan.textContent = 'Unsubscribe'; } } } function updateSubscriptionButton() { var listItems = document.querySelectorAll('.subscription-options li'); if (listItems.length === 0) return; var anyActive = false; listItems.forEach(function(item) { var checkbox = item.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { if (checkbox.checked) { item.classList.add('active'); anyActive = true; // Set anyActive to true } else { item.classList.remove('active'); // Remove 'active' class if checkbox is unchecked } } }); // Update the button text based on whether any list item has the 'active' class updateButtonText(anyActive); } document.addEventListener('click', function(event) { var clickedItem = event.target.closest('.subscription-options li'); if (clickedItem) { var checkbox = clickedItem.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { checkbox.checked = !checkbox.checked; updateSubscriptionButton(); } } });

뉴스제목: Bitcoin To Hit $180,000 If These Cycle Top Indicators Are Absent, Says VanEck’s Sigel
본문: Bitcoin could soar to $180,000 in 2025 if key cycle top indicators remain muted, according to Matthew Sigel, Head of Digital Assets Research at VanEck. Speaking with podcast host Natalie Brunell, Sigel outlined a clear four-year pattern in Bitcoin’s price action that he believes has persisted through multiple market cycles. Why $180,000 Per Bitcoin Seems Plausible Sigel explained that Bitcoin tends to outperform nearly every other asset class for three years out of each four-year halving cycle, followed by a deep correction in the fourth year. Referencing a drawdown typically ranging from 60% to 80%, Sigel said this decline often arrives roughly two years after the BTC halving event. Since Bitcoin’s most recent halving took place in April 2024, Sigel sees 2024 and 2025 as potentially strong years. “That down year typically is the second year after the halving,” Sigel explained. “The Bitcoin halving occurred in April of this year. So 2024 [will be a] strong year, 2025 should be a strong year. I think 2026, unless something changes, would be a down year.” Related Reading: Can Bitcoin Hit $160,000 In 2025? Matrixport Thinks So Drawing on historical data, he recalled the smallest trough-to-peak appreciation in Bitcoin’s previous cycles, which was approximately 2,000%. Even if that figure halves to 1,000%, Sigel pointed out that Bitcoin could rise from a trough of around $18,000 to as high as $180,000 in the current cycle. “So I see an upside to $180,000 this cycle, and I think that’s likely to happen next year,” Sigel added. He also emphasized that Bitcoin’s volatility means the price could overshoot or undershoot that number, but that $180,000 represents a plausible target for 2024 if the pattern holds and no major “red light” indicators appear. Sigel broke down what he sees as the most important topping signals for traders to watch. The first involves derivatives funding rates: if the annualized cost to hold bullish Bitcoin positions on leveraged markets pushes above 10% for longer than a couple of months, Sigel considers that a red flag. “Some of those indicators include the funding rates. When the funding rate for Bitcoin exceeds 10% for more than a couple months, that tends to be a red light,” Sigel warned and explained that recent market activity reset elevated funding rates: “[Last week’s] washout eliminated that as well. So funding rates [are] not really flashing red.” The second is the level of unrealized profits on the blockchain, where on-chain analysis can reveal whether market participants’ cost basis is so low that significant profit-taking might soon create selling pressure. “We’re not seeing scary amounts of unrealized profits [yet],” Sigel noted. Finally, he said anecdotal evidence of widespread retail leverage or speculation could also flash warning lights. He explained that if all these risk indicators were to align at a certain price point—for example, if Bitcoin hit $150,000 and these metrics pointed to a market top—he would be cautious. However, he said that if the price reached around $180,000 without those signals appearing, there might still be room for further appreciation. Related Reading: National Bitcoin Reserve Initiative: MP Satoshi Hamada Urges Japan To Take Action “If we reach $180K and none of those lights are flashing, maybe we let it run. If all those lights are flashing and the price is $150K, I’m not gonna wait,” Sigel added. Next BTC Cycle Predictions He also explored the longer-term growth potential for Bitcoin by comparing it to gold’s market capitalization. Because about half of gold’s supply is used for industrial and jewelry purposes, he reasoned that the other half can be compared more directly to Bitcoin’s function as an investment and store of value. If Bitcoin were to reach a valuation comparable to that half portion of gold’s market cap, Sigel believes the price could trend toward roughly $450,000 per coin over the course of the next cycle. Taking an even more forward-looking perspective, he described VanEck’s long-term model in which global central banks might eventually hold Bitcoin as part of their reserves, even if just at a 2% weighting. Since gold constitutes about 18% of central bank reserves worldwide, Sigel’s assumption is that Bitcoin’s share would be far smaller by comparison. He also factored in the prospect that Bitcoin might one day serve as a settlement currency for global trade, potentially among emerging economic alliances such as the BRICS nations (Brazil, Russia, India, China, and South Africa), which could push its valuation significantly higher. In VanEck’s calculations, this scenario might place Bitcoin at $3 million per coin by 2050: “We also assume that Bitcoin is used as a settlement currency for global trade, most likely among BRICS countries. We get to three million dollars a coin by 2050, which would be about a 16% compound annual growth rate.” At press time, BTC traded at $107,219. Featured image from YouTube / Natalie Brunell, chart from TradingView.com

뉴스제목: Avalanche Unveils Major Network Upgrade to Boost Subnets and Smart Contracts
본문: Two major developments in blockchain technology emerged this week, highlighting ongoing efforts to enhance scalability and efficiency across layer-1 networks. Avalanche rolled out its largest upgrade to date, Avalanche9000, introducing improvements that reduce costs for launching subnet blockchains and running smart contracts. Meanwhile, Monad Labs announced the formation of the Monad Foundation, an independent entity focused on governance and ecosystem development, signaling significant progress toward a potential mainnet launch. Avalanche Launches Avalanche9000 Upgrade to Usher in Hundreds of New Layer-1 Blockchains Avalanche (AVAX) - the application-friendly layer-1 blockchain - has officially rolled out its largest-ever upgrade, Avalanche9000, introducing key advancements aimed at enhancing its network efficiency and accessibility. Announced on Monday, the much-anticipated upgrade is poised to revolutionize the blockchain landscape by making it easier and significantly cheaper to launch subnet blockchains and deploy smart contracts. “This is the start of hundreds of Avalanche L1s launching,” Avalanche’s team proclaimed in a post on X. “Avalanche9000 reduces the cost to deploy an L1 by 99.9%, and with hundreds of L1s being developed on testnet, look out for an explosion of launches in the coming months.” Key Features of Avalanche9000 The Avalanche9000 upgrade integrates two major improvement proposals, ACP-77 and ACP-125, signaling a significant leap for developers, validators, and end-users. 1. Validator Optimization Through ACP-77 A major highlight of ACP-77 is its overhaul of validator requirements. Previously, validators had to stake a minimum of 2,000 AVAX tokens – valued at approximately $100,000 – to validate the main Avalanche network alongside any subnets they operated. This setup posed substantial financial and hardware burdens on participants. The “Etna” upgrade, as part of ACP-77, addresses this limitation by decoupling validators from the requirement to validate the primary chain when focusing on specific subnets. This change allows validators to dedicate their efforts to specific layer-1 subnets, cutting down operational costs and enabling more efficient hardware usage. With reduced entry barriers, the Etna upgrade paves the way for projects to bootstrap their own blockchains cost-effectively. Furthermore, it introduces regulatory flexibility, empowering subnet operators to meet specific jurisdictional requirements as needed. 2. Lowering Fees with ACP-125 Another pivotal enhancement is ACP-125, which directly impacts Avalanche’s primary smart contract chain, the C-Chain. The proposal reduces the base fee from 25 nAVAX to 1 nAVAX (roughly $0.00000004), addressing what the Avalanche team described as an ”artificially high” minimum fee. “The current minimum base fee of 25 nAVAX is higher than what the market demands, leading to artificially reduced network usage,” reads the official ACP-125 proposal on GitHub . “By lowering the minimum base fee to 1 nAVAX, we allow the market to dictate appropriate fee levels, resulting in a more efficient allocation of resources and potentially higher network usage.” This reduction is expected to stimulate activity on Avalanche’s C-Chain by making smart contract interactions significantly cheaper, catering to developers and users seeking affordable decentralized application (dApp) deployment. At the heart of Avalanche’s scalability lies its subnet architecture. Subnets are sovereign groups of validators working together to validate transactions on specific blockchains, offering a “blockchain-as-a-service” model that supports customization for diverse use cases. Subnets can tailor their parameters, including tokenomics, validator sets, and consensus mechanisms, enabling developers to create highly specialized layer-1 solutions without being tied to Avalanche’s main chain operations. This flexibility opens doors for innovation across industries ranging from gaming and decentralized finance (DeFi) to enterprise applications. Avalanche claims to already support over 500 layer-1 blockchains, with Avalanche9000 expected to accelerate subnet adoption significantly. The Avalanche9000 upgrade arrives on the back of substantial financial support and developer activity. Earlier this year, Avalanche launched its Avalanche9000 testnet, allocating over $40 million in retroactive rewards to developers building on the network. The testnet saw strong engagement, signaling growing enthusiasm among blockchain builders. Adding to this momentum, the Avalanche Foundation recently secured $250 million in funding through a locked token sale. The round was led by prominent venture capital firms including Galaxy Digital, Dragonfly Capital, and ParaFi Capital, signaling investor confidence in Avalanche’s vision. The capital injection will help ensure a smooth rollout of Avalanche9000 while supporting future ecosystem growth, developer incentives, and subnet launches. Avalanche: A Multi-Chain Powerhouse Avalanche’s architecture comprises three distinct blockchains optimized for specific functionalities: X-Chain (Exchange Chain): Handles the creation and trading of digital assets. P-Chain (Platform Chain): Coordinates validators and manages subnets. C-Chain (Contract Chain): Executes Ethereum-compatible smart contracts, making it ideal for dApp deployment. This multi-chain design, combined with Avalanche9000’s improvements, positions Avalanche as one of the most scalable and versatile layer-1 networks in the blockchain ecosystem. Monad Labs Unveils the Monad Foundation to Drive Blockchain Development Ahead of Mainnet Launch In related news, on Monday, Monad Labs announced the establishment of the Monad Foundation, an independent organization dedicated to advancing the growth, governance, and adoption of the Monad blockchain. The formation of the foundation marks a critical milestone for Monad, which recently rolled out its testnet and is now positioning itself closer to a potential mainnet and token launch. In its official blog post , the Monad Foundation described its mission as fostering validator-driven governance, supporting community-led improvement proposals, and providing tools and documentation for developers. The foundation will also play a pivotal role in ecosystem growth, marketing, and advisory initiatives for the Monad blockchain. ”We are sharing an exciting organizational update, signaling a next step in the evolution of the Monad blockchain: the Monad Foundation, an independent organization dedicated to encouraging the development and adoption of the Monad blockchain protocol,” the foundation announced. While the statement refrained from explicitly confirming a mainnet or token launch, the timing of the foundation’s launch has fueled speculation that such milestones could be imminent. This comes on the heels of Monad Labs' progressive testnet rollout, which began in November, a step widely regarded as a precursor to a full mainnet deployment. The Monad Foundation’s core focus areas include: Validator-Led Governance:The foundation will facilitate decentralized governance through validators, ensuring that key decisions about the protocol’s evolution are driven by stakeholders within the community. This approach aligns with the decentralized ethos of blockchain technology. Developer Support and Tools:Providing detailed developer documentation, tools, and educational resources will be central to the foundation’s activities. The goal is to create a robust developer ecosystem that supports the growth of decentralized applications (dApps) on the Monad blockchain. Ecosystem Development and Adoption:The foundation will engage in ecosystem development, offering marketing and advisory support for projects building on Monad. By fostering strategic partnerships and promoting community-led improvement proposals, the foundation aims to accelerate Monad’s adoption. The formation of the Monad Foundation comes amid increasing interest and investment in the Monad blockchain ecosystem. In July, three projects built on Monad announced securing venture capital funding, signaling growing confidence in the network’s potential. Earlier this year, Monad Labs made headlines when it raised $225 million in a Series A funding round led by Paradigm in April, reportedly at a $3 billion valuation. The funding points to strong backing from major players in the blockchain investment space and highlighted the industry’s recognition of Monad as a promising layer-1 solution. Monad aims to address Ethereum’s current scalability challenges by offering significant improvements in throughput and efficiency. Unlike layer-1 networks that replicate Ethereum’s existing codebase, Monad is building a brand-new Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) from the ground up. Monad leverages a pipelined architecture, a technical innovation that allows the blockchain to process multiple steps of transactions simultaneously. This design significantly enhances transaction throughput, making Monad a high-performance alternative to traditional Ethereum-compatible chains. By improving Ethereum’s operational efficiency while maintaining EVM compatibility, Monad enables developers to deploy Ethereum-based dApps with higher scalability, lower latency, and greater performance. The approach positions Monad as a next-generation layer-1 solution capable of supporting demanding decentralized applications. Mainnet Launch on the Horizon? The timing of the Monad Foundation's formation and the recent launch of Monad’s testnet have fueled anticipation within the crypto community. Typically, testnet deployments allow developers to test applications and protocols in a simulated environment, ironing out bugs before launching a mainnet. With Monad’s testnet already in progress, the community is speculating that a mainnet rollout—and potentially a token launch—could soon follow. The foundation’s focus on governance and ecosystem development further hints at readiness for a fully operational network. Validator participation, governance frameworks, and developer adoption are all critical components that must align ahead of a successful mainnet deployment. Monad’s emergence comes at a time when scaling solutions and Ethereum alternatives are in high demand. Ethereum remains the dominant smart contract platform, but its limited throughput and rising transaction fees continue to present challenges for developers and users. By building a new EVM optimized for performance, Monad positions itself as a solution that retains Ethereum’s compatibility while offering a scalable, high-throughput alternative. This is particularly significant as decentralized finance (DeFi), gaming, and other dApp sectors require networks that can process large volumes of transactions efficiently.

뉴스제목: Top 5 Cheap Cryptos to Buy Now Under $1 for Huge Returns in January
본문: The post Top 5 Cheap Cryptos to Buy Now Under $1 for Huge Returns in January appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News As the cryptocurrency market reaches unprecedented heights, investors are turning their attention to affordable digital assets with high growth potential. With major tokens hitting new milestones and altcoins experiencing significant surges, there is a keen interest in low-cost cryptocurrencies that could yield substantial returns. Discovering these promising tokens under $1 could be the key to capitalizing on the current bullish trends. Standing out among these is XYZVerse (XYZ) , a pioneering memecoin uniting fans of football, basketball, MMA, and esports within its ecosystem, aiming for exponential growth in the thriving market. The All-Sports Meme Token You Can’t Afford to Bench! XYZ is your exclusive VIP pass to a sports-driven, meme-fueled revolution. Think of it as the MVP of the XYZVerse ecosystem, where degens can score big off the growing demand for meme coins Picture this: Polymarket hitting $1 billion in trading volume during the US presidential election – now throw in the hype of meme coins and the thrill of sports betting. With millions of sports fans ready to hit the field and cash in the XYZVerse ecosystem is set to keep expanding – and your rewards will slam dunk through the roof! >>>XYZ presale is your first-quarter chance to get in before the mind-blowing explosion! In 2024, meme coins are the undisputed champions of the crypto world, and XYZ is set to crush the competition. With potential thousand-fold returns that will blow past the finish line, the presale plan draws a hefty 9,900% growth by the TGE. Forget about BOME’s 5,000% rise or WIF’s 1,000% rally – XYZ is here to outscore them all! With upcoming listings on major CEX and DEX platforms, rock-solid defense in the form of audited smart contracts, and a fully vetted team, XYZ is already ahead of the game. The first-mover advantage is key here – get in before the crowd storms the field, and you’ll be sitting on way bigger returns! >>Don’t be left on the bench – grab your XYZ tokens now and be part of the next massive crypto championship! Pepe (PEPE) PEPE is a deflationary memecoin launched on the Ethereum blockchain as a tribute to the Pepe the Frog internet meme created by Matt Furie. The coin aims to capitalize on the popularity of meme-based cryptocurrencies like Shiba Inu and Dogecoin. PEPE distinguishes itself by implementing a no-tax policy and embracing its identity as a pure memecoin without utility, appealing to those who value simplicity in the crypto space. In late April to May 2023, PEPE experienced a significant surge, with its market capitalization reaching up to $1.6 billion. This rapid growth created substantial gains for early investors and fostered a strong community. The project’s roadmap includes three phases: initial listings on platforms like CoinMarketCap and trending on Twitter, followed by listings on centralized exchanges, and culminating in “tier 1” exchange listings and a “meme takeover.” The coin’s performance has sparked interest during what some refer to as a “memecoin season.” Whether PEPE will continue to perform strongly in the current market cycle remains a topic of interest among cryptocurrency enthusiasts. JasmyCoin (JASMY) JasmyCoin (JASMY) is a cryptocurrency project developed by Jasmy Corporation, a Tokyo-based Internet of Things (IoT) provider. The platform connects service providers and data users, facilitating the buying and selling of data. By integrating IoT technology with blockchain, Jasmy aims to restore and protect the sovereignty of individual data, giving users control over their personal information. The Jasmy platform creates a secure environment where users can exchange data between IoT devices and decentralized protocols without relying on trust. By leveraging edge computing and storing data on the InterPlanetary File System (IPFS), Jasmy decentralizes data workflows. The project seeks to democratize data ownership, allowing users to transform their information into personal assets while enabling service providers to utilize this data to promote their services. The potential of JasmyCoin lies in its unique approach to data management within the expanding IoT ecosystem. Shiba Inu (SHIB) Shiba Inu (SHIB) is a cryptocurrency that began as a meme coin inspired by Dogecoin but sets itself apart by running on the Ethereum blockchain. Launched in August 2020 by the anonymous developer Ryoshi, SHIB started with a supply of 1 quadrillion tokens. Half of these tokens were sent to Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin, who donated a significant portion to the India Covid Crypto Relief Fund and burned 40% of the total supply, removing them from circulation. SHIB’s operation on Ethereum allows it to participate in a wide range of decentralized applications. This integration has led to the creation of ShibaSwap, a decentralized exchange where users can trade and stake SHIB tokens. Future plans include developing an NFT platform and establishing a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) for governance. These developments aim to enhance SHIB’s functionality and presence in the cryptocurrency space beyond its origins as a meme coin. Kaspa (KAS) Kaspa is a proof-of-work cryptocurrency that utilizes the GHOSTDAG protocol. Unlike traditional blockchains that discard blocks created simultaneously, GHOSTDAG allows these parallel blocks to coexist and orders them through consensus. This method transforms the blockchain into a block directed acyclic graph (blockDAG), generalizing the Nakamoto consensus. As a result, Kaspa can securely operate at very high block rates, currently achieving one block per second with ambitions to reach 10 blocks per second and even 100 in the future. Confirmation times are exceptionally short, primarily limited only by internet latency. The Kaspa implementation offers features like Reachability, enabling users to query the topology of the DAG. It supports block data pruning and plans to introduce block header pruning soon. Additional functionalities include Simplified Payment Verification (SPV) proofs and anticipated subnetwork support, which will facilitate the implementation of layer 2 solutions. These advancements position Kaspa as a scalable and efficient cryptocurrency. In the current market cycle, its focus on high transaction speeds and minimal confirmation times may appeal to users and investors seeking effective blockchain technologies. Conclusion PEPE, JASMY, SHIB, and KAS are promising under $1 cryptos, but XYZVerse (XYZ) uniquely blends memes and sports, aiming for 20,000% growth with strong community engagement. 뉴스제목: XRP Is On The Rise Again! What Is The Reason For The Rise? Analysts Explained, Gave A Date For A New Record!
본문: Today will be an important day for Ripple. As Ripple announced yesterday, its stablecoin Ripple USD (RLUSD) will be available for sale on global exchanges starting from December 17. “Each RLUSD token is fully backed by US dollar deposits, US government securities, and cash equivalents,” Ripple said in a statement. While RLUSD is expected to be available for sale on exchanges, the XRP price has increased by over 14% in the last 24 hours, making it the second altcoin to gain the most in the last 24 hours. Evaluating this rise in XRP, Obchakevich Research founder Alex Obchakevich stated that RLUSD was behind the recent rise in XRP and said, “Since XRP will be burned in RLUSD transactions, the two assets are intertwined and investors noticed this connection.” “XRP has seen the biggest growth among the top 10 cryptocurrencies over the past week, significantly outpacing Bitcoin’s 10% increase over the same time frame. XRP has been consolidating in this bull flag for a while now, but I think it will head towards $4 once it breaks the $2.60 resistance. “Also, according to my predictions, RLUSD will enter the top 100 cryptocurrencies with a market cap of over $1 billion in the first days.” Bitrue exchange chief executive Adam O'Neill stated that the launch of RLUSD will play a role in increasing market demand for XRP and will support the rise in price. O'Neill pointed to spot XRP ETFs as a bullish factor other than RLUSD, and stated that he expects them to be approved in 2025. “We think XRP ETFs will also be a likely event in 2025 and we expect a new record for XRP by the end of Q1 2025 at the latest. Because we think XRP will benefit greatly from Trump's pro-crypto administration.” XRP continues to trade at $2.68, up 14 percent in the last 24 hours. *This is not investment advice. 뉴스제목: Google releases AI tool that creates images from other images
본문: Google has unveiled Whisk, a new AI tool that generates images using other images as prompts. Unlike older tools that rely heavily on long, detailed text descriptions, Whisk reportedly allows users to upload images to define the subject, scene, and style they want to generate. The tool also supports multiple images for each of these inputs, giving users significant flexibility to experiment. If you don’t have an image to start with, Google has a dice icon that auto-fills the prompts with visuals. However, these placeholder images appear to be AI-generated as well. Users can also add a bit of text to fine-tune the output, but the text box is optional. Whisk still churns out results without it, according to the company. The tool then generates an image and a corresponding text prompt that was used in its creation. If you like the result, you can favorite it or download it. If you don’t, you can refine it by editing the underlying text prompt or generating something entirely new. Imagen 3 powers Google’s Whisk AI Google says Whisk is built for “rapid visual exploration, not pixel-perfect edits.” So while it’s flexible and fun to use, it won’t deliver flawless results every time. The company admits the tool can “miss the mark,” which is why they allow quick edits for better accuracy. Whisk runs on Google’s latest Imagen 3 image generation model, which the company also announced alongside the tool. Imagen 3 powers Whisk to produce its AI-generated results, and the underlying technology is said to improve the overall quality of the outputs. Alongside Imagen 3, Google also introduced Veo 2, its upgraded video generation model. Veo 2 reportedly has a better grasp of cinematography and fixes common issues like hallucinated features—for example, the classic AI error of extra fingers. The model is first launching on Google’s VideoFX platform, which is still in limited testing through Google Labs. The company says Veo 2 will eventually expand to YouTube Shorts and other Google products sometime in 2025. For now, the company positions Whisk as an exploration tool rather than a professional editing solution. Whether it holds up against competitors like OpenAI’s DALL-E remains to be seen. 뉴스제목: Crypto Hack Alert: $5.63M Lost as LastPass Breach Hits 40 Wallets
본문: The post Crypto Hack Alert: $5.63M Lost as LastPass Breach Hits 40 Wallets appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The fallout from the 2022 LastPass cyberattack is now hitting cryptocurrency holders hard, with over $5.36 million recently stolen. Blockchain investigator ZachXBT revealed that the “LastPass threat actor” targeted more than 40 crypto addresses in this latest heist. How the Attack Played Out In a December 17 update, ZachXBT explained that the stolen funds were first converted into Ethereum, then moved through various instant exchanges, and finally transferred back into Bitcoin. This incident is part of a string of attacks that began with the December 2022 LastPass breach, where attackers accessed encrypted vault data stored on an unknown cloud platform. At the time, LastPass assured users that their master passwords were protected with high-level encryption, making brute-force attacks highly unlikely. Despite this, hackers have been systematic, targeting users who stored cryptocurrency private keys or seed phrases within their LastPass vaults. .article-inside-link { margin-left: 0 !important; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; font-weight: 600; list-style-type: none; margin-bottom: 0; display: inline-block; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li:last-child { display: none; } Also Read : Weekly Crypto Hack Report: Are Your Digital Assets Safe? , Losses Mount to $250 Million According to cybersecurity group Security Alliance (SEAL), total losses from the LastPass hacks have exceeded $250 million as of May 2024. Major incidents include $6.2 million stolen in February 2024 and $4.4 million in October 2023. As of May 2024, over 250 million USD has been stolen, and almost all of it was preventable https://t.co/CYt8acsofm — Security Alliance (@_SEAL_Org) December 16, 2024 Hackers have strategically timed many of these attacks to coincide with holiday seasons, when people are more likely to fall for scams, fake promotions, or festive bonuses. With Christmas just a week away, the risk of further attacks remains high. Secure Your Assets Now! LastPass users who suspect they have stored private keys or seed phrases in their vaults are urged to move their crypto assets immediately to safer storage solutions. This ongoing wave of attacks underscores the risks of relying on centralized password managers to protect critical blockchain data. While LastPass promotes its encryption capabilities, this breach shows that even encrypted data can be vulnerable when stolen in bulk. To avoid similar risks in the future, crypto holders should: Avoid storing private keys or seed phrases on online platforms. Use hardware wallets, which offer secure offline storage. 뉴스제목: How Brazil’s Crypto Regulations Are Shaping Latin America’s Blockchain Future
본문: Brazil is emerging as a leader in Latin America’s blockchain revolution, with progressive crypto regulations that set the stage for widespread adoption and innovation. By implementing frameworks that balance consumer protection, financial transparency, and technological growth, Brazil is creating a favorable environment for cryptocurrencies and blockchain-based solutions. This leadership is inspiring neighboring countries to adopt similar policies, fostering regional cooperation and accelerating blockchain innovation. Much like the transformative opportunities presented by the Lightchain AI Presale , Brazil’s regulatory advancements showcase the potential of blockchain to drive economic inclusion, financial efficiency, and technological growth. As Brazil shapes the regulatory roadmap, it is solidifying its role as a hub for Latin America’s blockchain future. Brazil’s Current Crypto Regulations Brazil has significantly advanced its cryptocurrency regulations to enhance market transparency and investor protection. In December 2022, Law No. 14,478/22, known as the Brazilian Virtual Assets Law, was enacted, establishing a legal framework for virtual asset service providers (VASPs). This law mandates that VASPs obtain authorization from the Central Bank of Brazil (BCB) to operate, adhere to anti-money laundering (AML) protocols, and comply with consumer protection standards. The BCB is actively developing detailed regulations, with plans to finalize them by early 2025. This process includes public consultations to ensure the rules are tailored to Brazil's unique market conditions. Additionally, the Brazilian Securities Commission (CVM) oversees digital assets classified as securities, ensuring comprehensive regulatory coverage. These coordinated efforts by Brazilian authorities aim to foster a secure and transparent environment for cryptocurrency activities, balancing innovation with robust regulatory oversight. The Impact of Regulations on Brazil’s Blockchain Industry Brazil’s progressive crypto regulations have had a significant impact on the country’s blockchain industry. By providing a clear legal framework for virtual assets, Brazil has encouraged the growth of blockchain-based solutions and attracted investment from both domestic and international players. 1. Fostering Innovation and Entrepreneurship By creating a favorable environment for virtual asset service providers, Brazil has opened up opportunities for entrepreneurs and startups to develop innovative blockchain-based solutions. With clear regulations in place, businesses can operate with legal certainty and focus on growth and innovation rather than navigating regulatory ambiguity. This has resulted in a thriving blockchain ecosystem, with numerous startups emerging to address various challenges across industries such as finance, logistics, supply chain management, and more. These startups are not only driving economic growth but also solidifying Brazil’s position as a leader in Latin America’s blockchain landscape. 2. Attracting Investment Brazil’s progressive crypto regulations have also attracted significant investment into the country's blockchain ecosystem. The legal clarity and regulatory oversight provided by Brazil's framework have instilled confidence in investors, leading to increased funding for blockchain-based companies. Investors recognize the potential of Brazil as a market with growing demand for innovative solutions and are keen to capitalize on this opportunity. This influx of capital has not only accelerated growth within the industry but also boosted Brazil’s economy as a whole. 3. Promoting Financial Inclusion One of the key objectives of Brazil’s crypto regulations is to promote financial inclusion. With over 45 million unbanked adults in Brazil, blockchain-based solutions offer a way to bridge the gap and provide access to financial services for underserved populations. By establishing a secure and transparent environment, Brazil’s regulations are enabling financial institutions and businesses to leverage blockchain technology to reach new customers and provide them with more efficient and cost-effective services. 4. Enhancing Transparency Another significant impact of Brazil’s regulatory advancements is increased transparency in the cryptocurrency market. With clear guidelines on AML protocols, VASPs must adhere to strict compliance measures, reducing the risk of money laundering activities associated with cryptocurrencies. This transparency has also enhanced consumer protection, as individuals can now confidently engage in crypto transactions knowing that they are operating within a regulated framework. This has helped reduce the stigma surrounding cryptocurrencies and increased adoption rates within Brazil. Regional Influence of Brazil’s Crypto Regulations Brazil’s progressive regulations have also had a significant impact on other countries in the region, inspiring them to follow suit. Countries like Argentina, Mexico, and Colombia, which previously had restrictive policies towards cryptocurrencies, are now considering or implementing similar frameworks to promote innovation and economic growth. This regional cooperation is fostering a more robust and interconnected blockchain ecosystem across Latin America. As Brazil continues to shape the regulatory roadmap for crypto in the region, it is solidifying its position as a leader in the continent's blockchain future. Does Lightchain AI Push Brazil’s Regulatory Advancements? Lightchain AI (LCAI) has the potential to complement Brazil’s evolving crypto regulations by introducing advanced, AI-driven solutions for compliance and operational efficiency. As Brazil implements its Virtual Assets Law and prepares detailed regulations under the Central Bank of Brazil (BCB), Lightchain AI’s capabilities can streamline regulatory adherence for platforms and service providers. Its AI algorithms optimize KYC (Know Your Customer) processes, anti-money laundering (AML) protocols, and transaction monitoring, ensuring seamless compliance with Brazil’s strict standards. Moreover, LCAI’s focus on scalability and transparency aligns with Brazil’s push for investor protection and innovation-friendly frameworks. By supporting decentralized platforms, Lightchain AI fosters a regulatory-compliant ecosystem that empowers creators, businesses, and investors. As the Lightchain AI presale progresses, its tools can bridge the gap between Brazil's dynamic crypto landscape and technological advancements. What Are the Challenges for Blockchain & Crypto in Latin America? Although Brazil’s progressive crypto regulations have had a significant impact, the region still faces challenges in adopting and implementing blockchain technology. Some of these include: Lack of education and awareness Many individuals and businesses are unfamiliar with blockchain technology, hindering its adoption. Infrastructure limitations Limited access to internet services and technological infrastructure can impede the integration of blockchain-based solutions. Regulatory fragmentation Despite Brazil's advancements, other countries in Latin America have varying regulatory approaches towards cryptocurrencies, making it challenging for businesses to operate across borders. As the region continues to address these challenges, collaboration between governments, businesses, and educational institutions will be crucial to drive further growth and innovation in the blockchain industry. With continued efforts and advancements, Latin America has the potential to become a global leader in blockchain technology. Future Prospects for Blockchain in Latin America The future of blockchain in Latin America is bright, with Brazil leading the way. As more countries in the region follow suit and implement progressive regulations, it will foster a more interconnected and innovative ecosystem for blockchain technology. With increased investment, financial inclusion, transparency, and regional cooperation, Latin America's blockchain industry has the potential to drive significant economic growth and disrupt traditional industries. And with Lightchain AI's cutting-edge solutions complementing Brazil's regulatory advancements, this progress can accelerate even further. The future for blockchain technology in Latin America looks promising, and Brazil is well-positioned to lead the charge towards a more decentralized and efficient economy. Why Should People Invest Lightchain AI in Latin America? Investing in Lightchain AI and its mission to provide secure and scalable solutions for the blockchain industry is a strategic move for those looking to tap into the potential of Latin America's growing market. With its focus on compliance, transparency, and operational efficiency, Lightchain AI aligns with Brazil's progressive regulatory landscape, enhancing its value for investors. Moreover, with Brazil's influence on other countries in the region, investing in LCAI can also provide access to emerging markets that are adopting similar regulations and fostering a conducive environment for blockchain technology. Supporting Lightchain AI's growth can not only result in significant returns on investment but also contribute to the development of a more interconnected and innovative blockchain ecosystem in Latin America. Covering Up Lightchain AI's mission to improve compliance measures and reduce the risk of money laundering activities associated with cryptocurrencies is well-aligned with Brazil’s progressive regulatory framework. With its advanced AI-driven solutions, Lightchain AI can complement Brazil’s evolving crypto regulations and drive further growth and innovation in the region. As Latin America continues to make strides towards a more decentralized economy, investing in Lightchain AI presents a strategic opportunity for individuals and businesses looking to tap into this growing market. 뉴스제목: Hong Kong commits to global crypto tax reporting, first exchange set for 2028
본문: Hong Kong is officially onboard with the OECD’s Crypto-Asset Reporting Framework, promising to roll out a global crypto tax reporting system by 2028. On December 13, the government told the OECD’s Global Forum on Transparency and Effective Exchange of Information in Tax Matters that it will adopt the framework to tackle cross-border tax evasion and boost international tax transparency. Legislative changes will begin soon, and the clock is ticking. The framework, launched in June 2023, is a global reporting mechanism designed to close loopholes in crypto taxation. It forces tax jurisdictions to share data annually on crypto accounts and transactions involving their residents. Hong Kong’s crypto industry has become “directly relevant” to these efforts, according to the Global Forum. In response, the government will complete necessary legislative amendments by 2026, ensuring it can meet the first reporting deadline. Legislative overhaul: Clock starts now The Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury, Hui Ching-yu, said the framework is critical for Hong Kong’s position as a major international financial hub. “Implementing the Reporting Framework is vital to maintaining Hong Kong’s reputation as an international financial and business center and reflects Hong Kong’s reputation as a responsible tax jurisdiction,” he said. The government’s plan is straightforward. Amend laws, prepare the industry, and begin automatic tax reporting. But it’s not just about following orders. Reciprocity is a non-negotiable condition: Hong Kong will only share data with partners that meet strict standards for confidentiality and security. Local lawmakers will also consult stakeholders and the public during the process. Hong Kong already has experience in this arena. Since 2018, the region has exchanged financial account information annually with tax jurisdictions worldwide. This includes data on foreign bank accounts, which tax authorities use to uncover hidden income. How the OECD’s crypto tax system will work The OECD’s Crypto-Asset Reporting Framework applies to crypto-asset service providers, including exchanges, custodial wallets, and intermediaries. These providers will be required to collect detailed information on their users and transactions, including who owns the accounts, balances, and transaction histories. Once gathered, the data will be sent to tax authorities annually and shared between jurisdictions. Any user with a tax residency in a participating jurisdiction will find their crypto activity reported. In short, there’s no more hiding behind anonymous wallets or offshore platforms. Hong Kong’s exchanges and crypto firms will face a heavy lift. They’ll need to revamp their systems to track, secure, and share this data without breaking confidentiality rules. For some players, it’ll mean a big compliance bill. Smaller exchanges and wallet providers might struggle to keep up. The state of Hong Kong’s crypto regulations The Hong Kong government has spent the last two years remaking its regulatory landscape to support innovation while maintaining tight control. On June 1, 2023, the Anti-Money Laundering and Counter-Terrorist Financing Ordinance (AMLO) came into force. It mandates all Virtual Asset Service Providers (VASPs) to comply with anti-money laundering (AML) and counter-terrorism financing (CTF) rules. Under the current regime, platforms trading security tokens must obtain a license from the Securities and Futures Commission (SFC), while platforms handling non-security tokens like Bitcoin fall under AMLO’s licensing requirements. Both regimes demand strict compliance, with no exceptions. Hong Kong is also pushing forward with stablecoin regulations. In July 2024, the Financial Services and Treasury Bureau (FSTB) and the Hong Kong Monetary Authority (HKMA) released a consultation paper outlining a licensing framework for stablecoin issuers. This covers everything from governance to risk management and reserves. Only stablecoins issued by licensed entities will be available to retail investors. To prepare for the incoming regulations, the HKMA launched a sandbox program in March for stablecoin issuers. Meanwhile, licensing for VASPs remains competitive. As of press time, only OS Digital Securities Limited and Hash Blockchain Limited had secured full licenses. Fourteen other applicants are still in limbo. Interest is growing, but the bar remains high. Land a High-Paying Web3 Job in 90 Days: The Ultimate Roadmap

뉴스제목: How Blockchain Analytics Is Improving Transparency in the Crypto Space
본문: Blockchain analytics is revolutionizing the crypto space by providing unparalleled transparency and accountability across decentralized networks. Through advanced data tools, analytics platforms track transactions, monitor wallet activities, and detect illicit behavior, ensuring that blockchain ecosystems remain secure and trustworthy. This capability is particularly critical as the industry grows, bringing more users and regulatory scrutiny. Much like the innovations highlighted by the Lightchain AI Presale , blockchain analytics bridges trust gaps by offering actionable insights and enhancing compliance. By empowering users, regulators, and businesses with real-time data and transparency, blockchain analytics is shaping a more accountable and resilient cryptocurrency landscape, fostering widespread adoption and long-term sustainability. Importance of Transparency in the Crypto Space Transparency is a fundamental element of trust in any financial system. The lack thereof has been one of the biggest barriers to widespread adoption of cryptocurrencies. Unlike traditional finance, where centralized entities like banks and governments have visibility into transactions, blockchain networks are decentralized, making it challenging to track and monitor activities. The anonymity and pseudo-anonymity features that make cryptocurrency attractive also create opportunities for illicit actors to engage in money laundering, fraud, and other criminal activities. Blockchain analytics addresses these concerns by providing transparency across the entire network, from individual transactions to overall market trends. By doing so, it promotes trust among participants and enables regulatory compliance. Understanding Blockchain Analytics Blockchain analytics refers to the process of collecting, analyzing, and interpreting data from blockchain networks. It involves using advanced technologies like machine learning and artificial intelligence to track and monitor transactions, addresses, and other network activities. The goal of blockchain analytics is not only to detect suspicious or fraudulent behavior but also to provide meaningful insights into the overall health of the network. This includes identifying trends, patterns, and anomalies that can inform decision-making for users, businesses, and regulators. How Blockchain Analytics Works At its core, blockchain analytics tracks data from blockchain networks, such as transaction details, wallet addresses, and network nodes. This information is then processed and analyzed using advanced algorithms and machine learning techniques to identify patterns and anomalies. Blockchain analytics platforms also use data from external sources, such as exchanges, to cross-reference transactions and detect suspicious activities. This helps to create a more comprehensive view of the entire ecosystem. How Blockchain Analytics is Improving Transparency Blockchain analytics is not only enhancing transparency in the crypto space but also driving it forward. Here are some of the ways blockchain analytics is improving transparency in the crypto space: 1. Identifying Suspicious Activities One of the main benefits of blockchain analytics is its ability to identify and flag suspicious activities on the network. This includes tracking known scam addresses, detecting money laundering attempts, and identifying other illicit behaviors. By providing this information to users, businesses, and regulators, blockchain analytics promotes a safer environment for all participants in the cryptocurrency ecosystem. 2. Promoting Compliance With regulatory scrutiny increasing in the crypto space, compliance has become a crucial aspect for businesses operating within it. Blockchain analytics provides real-time data and insights that can help businesses stay compliant with regulations. This not only benefits the businesses themselves but also promotes a more transparent and trustworthy industry for all stakeholders. 3. Enhancing User Trust Transparency is key to building trust in any financial system, and blockchain analytics plays a vital role in promoting this trust among users of cryptocurrencies. By providing visibility into transactions and network activities, users can have confidence that their funds are being handled securely. 4. Providing Market Insights Blockchain analytics platforms collect data from various sources, including exchanges, to provide comprehensive market insights. This enables investors and traders to make informed decisions based on accurate information, rather than speculation or rumors. This also helps to create a more stable and mature market, attracting more participants and driving growth in the industry. Real-World Applications of Blockchain Analytics Blockchain analytics has become a cornerstone in improving transparency and security in the crypto space. One key application is monitoring decentralized exchanges (DEXs) to identify and prevent illicit activities like wash trading or market manipulation. It also plays a crucial role in tracking wallet activities, enabling the detection of suspicious patterns, such as large, unexplained transfers often linked to hacks or scams. Blockchain analytics aids compliance with regulatory requirements by supporting KYC (Know Your Customer) and AML (Anti-Money Laundering) efforts. Additionally, it empowers investors and businesses with actionable insights, fostering trust in the ecosystem. Innovations like Lightchain AI further enhance these applications by integrating AI for real-time monitoring, as demonstrated in its groundbreaking Lightchain AI Presale initiative. Lightchain AI's Role in Advancing Analytics Lightchain AI is at the forefront of integrating artificial intelligence with blockchain technology, enhancing analytics within decentralized ecosystems. Its Proof of Intelligence (PoI) consensus mechanism rewards nodes for executing AI computations, such as model training and data analysis, thereby improving network security and efficiency. The Artificial Intelligence Virtual Machine (AIVM) serves as a dedicated computational layer, enabling developers to deploy AI-driven decentralized applications (dApps) seamlessly. By incorporating these innovations, Lightchain AI addresses challenges in scalability, privacy, and data sovereignty, fostering a more transparent and equitable blockchain ecosystem. Its recent presale success, raising over $2.2 million, underscores the growing confidence in its potential to revolutionize blockchain analytics. Why Lightchain Can Benefit the Crypto Industry With its innovative integration of AI and blockchain technology, Lightchain AI is poised to significantly impact the crypto industry. Its advanced analytics capabilities will not only promote transparency and compliance but also drive growth and adoption by providing valuable insights for businesses, investors, and regulators. In addition, Lightchain AI's focus on scalability and privacy can help solve some of the key challenges facing the crypto space currently. By addressing these issues, it has the potential to attract more participants and drive mainstream adoption of cryptocurrencies. Also, Lightchain AI's commitment to decentralization and community participation aligns with the core values of blockchain technology, promoting a more fair and inclusive ecosystem for all. Wrapping Up Things Blockchain analytics is a vital tool in promoting transparency and security in the crypto space. It provides insights and data that can help identify and prevent illicit activities, promote compliance, and foster trust among users. Lightchain AI's innovations further enhance these capabilities, making it a key player in advancing the use of blockchain analytics. As the industry continues to evolve and grow, we can expect to see even more developments in this field that will drive progress towards a transparent and equitable decentralized future. Get today your Lightchain AI tokens and be part of this exciting journey towards a more transparent and trustworthy crypto space. https://lightchain.ai https://lightchain.ai/lightchain-whitepaper.pdf https://x.com/LightchainAI https://t.me/LightchainProtocol Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

뉴스제목: Xterio Partners with Reka to Build Emotionally Intelligent AI Agents for Gaming and Beyond
본문: Singapore, Singapore, December 17th, 2024, Chainwire Xterio aims to redefine AI-human interaction with emotionally adaptive companions that evolve with users. In an era where artificial intelligence is reshaping industries, Xterio is taking a bold step forward by partnering with Reka, a leading AI startup, to develop emotionally intelligent AI agents that promise to transform gaming, Web3, and beyond. These agents, powered by a proprietary emotion engine, are designed to interact, adapt, and evolve like human companions—offering more than just utility. While AI has long played a role in gaming, from NPC behavior to immersive storytelling, Xterio and Reka are pushing the boundaries of what’s possible. Their joint effort aims to create AI companions that can read and respond to emotions, delivering nuanced interactions that feel personal, empathetic, and profoundly human. “We’re building AI agents that are not just functional but fundamentally transformative in how they connect with users,” said Michael Tong, CEO at Xterio. “Our partnership with Reka allows us to integrate cutting-edge emotional intelligence into our products, creating experiences that evolve alongside users in meaningful ways.” Revolutionizing Interaction with AI At the heart of this collaboration is an advanced emotion engine developed by Reka, a company founded by researchers from DeepMind, Google Brain, and FAIR. The engine enables Xterio’s AI agents to interpret and respond to human emotions authentically, making them ideal for gaming, personal productivity, and emotional support. Xterio envisions a future where its AI agents extend to support a wide array of user actions, including on-chain trading, investing, and portfolio management. These agents will not only serve as emotionally intelligent companions but also act as practical allies, seamlessly managing tasks and providing valuable insights tailored to the owner's needs. Xterio first introduced its conversational AI technology during the "Meet Your Anima" event in April 2024. This Web3-based experience allowed users to engage in emotional dialogues with a digital pet-like AI, sparking widespread acclaim and over 1 billion input tokens processed. The success validated Xterio’s vision of blending emotional depth with advanced AI capabilities. Building on that momentum, Xterio is set to launch “Befriend”, a gamified event where users interact with AI agents in scenarios that playfully explore AI connections. Participants will not only experience the latest advancements in conversational AI but also compete for rewards in a uniquely engaging experiment. A New Standard for AI Companionship What sets Xterio’s AI agents apart is their adaptability and trustworthiness. Operating on blockchain technology, these agents have on-chain ownership provenance and provide transparency in every interaction. Beyond gaming, Xterio envisions applications in education, mental health, and productivity, where AI agents can become true partners in daily life. “Imagine an AI companion that evolves with you—offering emotional support, meaningful conversations, and tailored experiences,” said Dani Yogamata, co-founder and CEO of Reka. “This partnership with Xterio brings cutting-edge AI technologies to life in ways that are both entertaining and profoundly human.” Positioning for the Future of AI and Web3 Xterio’s partnership with Reka also underscores its broader ambitions in the Web3 ecosystem. By integrating blockchain technology with advanced AI, the company is creating a secure and decentralized framework for training and deploying its emotional engines. Users contribute to AI development through interactions, with full confidence that their data remains private and under their control. Upcoming projects like “Palio”, Xterio’s first AI-native game slated for Q1 2025, promise to blend conversational AI with trading mechanics, showcasing the versatility of this technology. The Industry Impact The Xterio-Reka collaboration highlights a broader trend: the race to create AI that doesn’t just act smart but feels human. Emotional AI is poised to become a critical component of user engagement across gaming, Web3, and enterprise applications. For Xterio, it’s a way to stand out in a competitive landscape by delivering experiences that resonate deeply with users. “As AI continues to evolve, the line between technology and human connection is blurring,” said Michael Tong. “At Xterio, we’re not just building products—we’re shaping the future of interaction.” About Xterio Xterio Foundation , based in Switzerland, was established by a Council and a team of seasoned technology and entertainment leaders with extensive free-to-play gaming expertise. Its mission is to develop, publish, and distribute premium interactive experiences at the intersection of blockchain and AI. Users can learn more at www.xter.io and follow us at https://x.com/XterioGames . ContactXterio Presscontact@xter.io Disclaimer: This is a sponsored press release and is for informational purposes only. It does not reflect the views of Crypto Daily, nor is it intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, or financial advice.
