뉴스제목: Pou: The Ultimate Guide to Features, Gameplay, and Tips for Raising Your Virtual Pet
본문: Pou: The Ultimate Guide to Features, Gameplay, and Tips for Raising Your Virtual Pet In the world of mobile gaming, Pou remains one of the most beloved and nostalgic virtual pet games ever created. With its cute alien pet, simple gameplay, and endless customization options, Pou has captured the hearts of millions around the globe. Developed by Zakeh , Pou offers players the experience of nurturing and caring for their very own virtual pet . Whether you’re feeding it, playing mini-games, or customizing its look, Pou is a perfect blend of fun, responsibility, and creativity. In this article, we’ll dive deep into everything you need to know about Pou —from its features and gameplay to tips for keeping your virtual pet happy and thriving. What is Pou? Pou is a mobile virtual pet game where players take care of a cute, alien-like creature. Launched in 2012 by Zakeh , Pou quickly rose to fame for its engaging yet simple mechanics. Players can interact with Pou in various ways, such as: Feeding it food Playing games to earn coins Cleaning and caring for its health Customizing its appearance with outfits, accessories, and colors Pou combines elements of responsibility with entertainment, offering players the satisfaction of nurturing a pet without the real-world commitment. How to Download Pou Pou is widely available on major platforms, making it accessible to players everywhere: Android Users: Download from the Google Play Store iOS Users: Available on the App Store Windows Users: Earlier versions of the game can be accessed on PC The game is free to play, but optional in-game purchases are available for those looking to buy exclusive items or upgrades. Key Features of Pou Pou’s appeal lies in its simplicity, addictive gameplay, and variety of activities. Here are the standout features of the game: 1. Virtual Pet Care Feed, bathe, and take care of Pou to keep it happy and healthy. Pou has energy, hunger, and cleanliness meters that you must maintain. 2. Fun Mini-Games Pou offers a wide selection of mini-games to keep you entertained while earning coins. Popular mini-games include: Sky Jump: Bounce Pou as high as possible. Food Drop: Catch falling food while avoiding harmful objects. Pou Popper: A bubble shooter-style game. Hill Drive: Drive Pou across hills while collecting coins. Each game provides rewards to spend on items and upgrades. 3. Customization Options Pou is incredibly customizable. You can change: Pou’s color and shape Outfits, hats, and glasses Room backgrounds, wallpapers, and furniture Coins earned from mini-games can be spent on accessories, food, and other items. 4. Interaction and Growth Talk to Pou, and it will mimic your voice, adding a layer of fun to the game. Watch Pou grow over time , becoming a more unique version of itself as you care for it. 5. Achievements and Progression Complete achievements to earn rewards and unlock new items. Progression in the game encourages consistent interaction and care for your Pou. 6. Social Features Visit your friends’ Pous and see how they’ve customized their pets. Share your Pou’s progress and look with others. How to Play Pou: A Step-by-Step Guide 1. Getting Started Download Pou from the Play Store or App Store. Launch the game, and you’ll meet your new virtual pet. 2. Feeding Your Pou Access the kitchen to feed Pou various foods like fruits, burgers, and drinks. Keep an eye on Pou’s hunger meter to ensure it’s well-fed. 3. Cleaning and Health Pou gets dirty over time. Visit the bathroom to clean it with soap and water. If Pou feels sick, use the health potions available in the lab to restore its health. 4. Playing Mini-Games Go to the Game Room to access Pou’s mini-games. Play games to earn coins, which you can use to buy food, outfits, and room decorations. 5. Customizing Your Pou Visit the shop to buy clothes, hats, and accessories. Use coins to customize your Pou’s look and personality. You can also decorate Pou’s rooms, including the kitchen, bathroom, and living room. 6. Watching Pou Grow As you take care of Pou, it will gradually grow over time. Interact with it daily to unlock achievements and new features. Best Mini-Games in Pou Pou’s mini-games are one of the most entertaining parts of the game. Here are some fan favorites: 1. Sky Jump Help Pou jump higher and higher by landing on platforms. Collect coins along the way to boost your score. 2. Food Drop Catch the food falling from the sky while avoiding harmful objects like bombs. A perfect mix of fun and challenge! 3. Pou Popper A bubble-shooting game where you match colored bubbles to clear the board and earn coins. 4. Hill Drive Drive Pou across hills and slopes while collecting coins. Be careful not to crash! 5. Memory Game Test your memory skills by matching cards with different symbols or items. Tips to Keep Your Pou Happy and Healthy To become a pro at caring for Pou, follow these helpful tips: 1. Feed Pou Regularly Keep Pou’s hunger meter full by feeding it a variety of foods. Avoid feeding it too much junk food, as this can reduce its health. 2. Keep Pou Clean Bathe Pou regularly in the bathroom to keep its cleanliness meter high. 3. Play Mini-Games to Earn Coins Coins are essential for buying food, accessories, and customizations. Play mini-games often to build your coin stash. 4. Use Health Potions If Pou gets sick, use health potions from the lab to restore its well-being quickly. 5. Experiment with Customizations Keep changing Pou’s outfits, accessories, and room decorations to make the game more engaging. 6. Play Daily Consistent interaction with Pou keeps it happy and unlocks new achievements and rewards. Why is Pou So Popular? Pou’s charm lies in its simplicity and universal appeal. Here’s why the game remains popular years after its release: 1. Nostalgic Gameplay Pou taps into the nostalgia of classic virtual pet games like Tamagotchi while introducing modern features. 2. Perfect for All Ages The game’s simplicity makes it ideal for players of all ages, from children to adults. 3. Relaxing and Stress-Free Pou offers a calm, stress-free experience where players can unwind and enjoy taking care of their virtual pet. 4. Endless Customization The wide variety of outfits, accessories, and room decorations keeps the game fresh and engaging. 5. Offline Play Pou can be played without an internet connection, making it accessible anytime, anywhere. Conclusion: Why You Should Play Pou Pou is a delightful and addictive virtual pet game that offers hours of fun and creativity. Whether you’re feeding it, playing mini-games, or customizing its appearance, Pou provides a rewarding experience for players of all ages. With its charming simplicity, endless customization, and engaging activities, Pou continues to be a fan-favorite mobile game. If you haven’t experienced the joy of raising your own virtual pet yet, download Pou today and start your journey! Take care of Pou, play mini-games, and unlock endless possibilities. Your new virtual pet is waiting for you! 뉴스제목: Hong Kong Pledges Crypto Asset Reporting Framework by 2026 to Combat Tax Evasion
본문: Hong Kong has announced its commitment to implementing the Crypto-Asset Reporting Framework (CARF), an initiative to enhance international tax transparency and combat cross-border tax evasion. This announcement, made at the OECD Global Forum on Transparency and Effective Exchange of Information in Tax Matters, aligns with the global effort to address the crypto-asset market’s challenges. The CARF, introduced by the OECD in June 2023, extends the Common Reporting Standard (CRS) for the Automatic Exchange of Financial Account Information. It offers a robust mechanism for jurisdictions to share crypto-related tax data. The framework mandates the annual exchange of crypto asset accounts and transaction information between jurisdictions where users or controlling persons are tax residents. Hong Kong Crypto Asset Framework: Can This Combat Tax Evasion? According to Hui Ching-yu, Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury, the government aims to complete the necessary local legislative amendments by 2026. This will pave the way for the first automatic exchange of information with relevant tax jurisdictions in 2028. The framework’s adoption will be reciprocal, ensuring that partner jurisdictions also adhere to stringent data confidentiality and security standards. Hui also emphasized the government’s intention to consult stakeholders and the public during the legislative process. “The government will listen to the views of relevant stakeholders and the public when preparing the necessary legislative amendments.” Since 2018, Hong Kong has automatically exchanged financial account information with partner jurisdictions under the CRS. The CARF builds on this legacy, addressing the unique complexities of crypto assets and adapting to their rapid market evolution. Global Implications and Hong Kong’s Strategic Role The OECD’s introduction of CARF reflects the global consensus that crypto-related tax transparency is necessary given the asset class’s meteoric rise. The CARF’s implementation will likely spur increased scrutiny of crypto transactions, compelling crypto-asset firms and users to adapt to stricter compliance requirements. This shift will enhance the integrity of financial systems worldwide, deterring illicit activities such as money laundering and tax evasion. A recent report indicates that Hong Kong is intensifying efforts to solidify its status as a premier offshore financial hub by proposing tax exemptions on cryptocurrency profits , private credit, overseas property, and carbon credits. Hong Kong has unveiled plans to fast-track crypto licensing for trading platforms, aiming to strengthen its position as a leading global cryptocurrency hub. https://t.co/vhZ8RuXpor — Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) December 11, 2024 A six-week consultation is underway to refine these measures. Complementing this, Hong Kong has embraced the crypto sector, introducing retail and institutional trading regulations, licensing exchanges like Hashkey and OSL, and enabling ZA Bank to offer direct cryptocurrency trading for retail customers. Hong Kong is also accelerating its efforts to become a global cryptocurrency hub with a fast-track licensing process for trading platforms and new regulatory measures. The Securities and Futures Commission (SFC) is developing a swift licensing framework, while a consultative panel to support licensed platforms is expected in early 2024. Since launching its crypto licensing regime in June 2023, firms like OSL Exchange and HashKey Exchange have obtained licenses, allowing them to serve retail investors. Additionally, Hong Kong is introducing legislation to regulate stablecoin issuers, requiring fiat-referenced stablecoins to be licensed by the Hong Kong Monetary Authority (HKMA) in alignment with global trends. As part of its ongoing effort, the Hong Kong Monetary Authority (HKMA) has recently launched the Digital Bond Grant Scheme (DBGS) to incentivize the issuance of tokenized bonds by covering up to 50% of eligible expenses, capped at $321,184 per grant. The post Hong Kong Pledges Crypto Asset Reporting Framework by 2026 to Combat Tax Evasion appeared first on Cryptonews .

뉴스제목: Shooting Games: Top Features, Types, and Tips for Mastering Gameplay
본문: Shooting Games: Top Features, Types, and Tips for Mastering Gameplay Shooting games have been a cornerstone of the gaming industry for decades, offering players a mix of adrenaline-pumping action, strategy, and immersive experiences. From classic arcade shooters to modern first-person shooter (FPS) masterpieces, shooting games are beloved by gamers of all skill levels for their engaging gameplay and competitive edge. In this comprehensive guide, we’ll explore everything about shooting games , including their key features, types, the most popular titles, and tips to master your skills. Whether you’re a beginner looking for advice or an experienced player seeking new challenges, this article is for you! What are Shooting Games? Shooting games are a genre of video games that focus on combat using firearms, ranged weapons, or other projectile-based attacks. The primary goal is often to defeat enemies, complete missions, or survive against waves of opponents. These games test players’ hand-eye coordination, accuracy, reflexes , and strategic thinking. Whether played solo, with friends, or in competitive multiplayer environments, shooting games deliver unmatched excitement and action. Key Features of Shooting Games Shooting games are defined by several core features that set them apart from other genres: 1. Combat-Focused Gameplay Shooting games revolve around combat scenarios that require precision, quick reflexes, and tactical planning. 2. Weapon Variety From pistols and rifles to futuristic energy weapons, shooting games offer an extensive arsenal of guns and gear for players to use. 3. Multiplayer Modes Many modern shooting games feature online multiplayer modes, allowing players to compete or cooperate with others globally. 4. Realistic Graphics and Sound Effects Advanced graphics and immersive sound design enhance the intensity of shooting games, making every gunshot and explosion feel lifelike. 5. Single-Player Campaigns Some shooting games offer story-driven single-player campaigns with missions, objectives, and rich narratives. 6. Customization Options Players can customize characters, weapons, and loadouts to suit their playstyles. 7. Competitive Esports Scene Shooting games are a popular genre in esports, with tournaments offering huge prizes and attracting millions of viewers worldwide. Types of Shooting Games Shooting games come in various types, each offering a unique gameplay experience: 1. First-Person Shooter (FPS) In FPS games, players view the game world from the first-person perspective , seeing through the eyes of their character. Examples: Call of Duty Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS:GO) Halo Infinite 2. Third-Person Shooter (TPS) TPS games provide a third-person camera view , where players can see their characters on the screen. Examples: Fortnite Gears of War The Division 2 3. Battle Royale Shooters A subgenre where players compete in a shrinking map to be the last person (or team) standing. These games mix shooting skills with survival strategy. Examples: PUBG (PlayerUnknown’s Battlegrounds) Apex Legends Call of Duty: Warzone 4. Tactical Shooters Tactical shooters focus on realistic gameplay with an emphasis on team coordination, strategy, and precision. Examples: Rainbow Six Siege Valorant Arma 3 5. Arcade Shooters Arcade shooters emphasize fun, fast-paced action over realism. These games often feature power-ups, bright visuals, and over-the-top gameplay. Examples: DOOM Eternal Cuphead Metal Slug 6. Rail Shooters Rail shooters guide players through a fixed path where they focus solely on shooting enemies without controlling movement. Examples: House of the Dead Star Fox 64 7. Shoot ‘Em Ups Shoot ‘Em Ups are fast-paced, retro-style games where players control a character or ship to shoot down waves of enemies. Examples: Space Invaders Galaga Ikaruga Top Shooting Games of All Time Here’s a list of some of the most popular and critically acclaimed shooting games: 1. Call of Duty Series Known for its thrilling FPS gameplay, cinematic campaigns, and competitive multiplayer modes. 2. Fortnite A third-person battle royale game with unique building mechanics that set it apart from the competition. 3. Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS:GO) A classic tactical shooter that remains one of the most-played esports titles worldwide. 4. PUBG: Battlegrounds A pioneer of the battle royale genre that challenges players to survive in large, open-world maps. 5. Apex Legends A fast-paced battle royale shooter with unique character abilities and team-based tactics. 6. Overwatch 2 A hero-based shooter where players use unique abilities to support their team in objective-based gameplay. 7. DOOM Eternal An action-packed FPS that delivers non-stop combat and brutal, satisfying gameplay. 8. Halo Infinite The latest installment in the Halo series, featuring futuristic weapons and an expansive multiplayer mode. 9. Valorant A tactical shooter blending precise gunplay with character-specific abilities. 10. Battlefield Series Known for its large-scale battles, destructible environments, and realistic military combat. Tips to Master Shooting Games Becoming a skilled shooter takes practice, strategy, and focus. Here are some tips to help you dominate in shooting games: 1. Improve Your Aim Use aim training tools like Aim Lab or Kovaak’s FPS Aim Trainer to practice precision. Adjust your mouse sensitivity or controller settings for smoother aiming. 2. Master Movement Learn to strafe, crouch, jump, and sprint efficiently to outmaneuver opponents. Use cover to avoid taking unnecessary damage. 3. Learn Maps and Game Modes Understanding the layout of maps, choke points, and spawn locations is crucial for tactical gameplay. In team-based games, play according to the mode’s objectives (e.g., capture the flag, domination, or bomb defusal). 4. Choose the Right Weapons Experiment with different weapons (snipers, rifles, SMGs) to find what suits your playstyle. Customize loadouts for different situations—long-range, close combat, or support roles. 5. Communicate with Your Team Use voice chat or pings to coordinate with teammates and share valuable information. Team communication is vital for tactical shooters and battle royale games. 6. Play Regularly and Watch Others Regular practice improves reflexes and decision-making. Watch professional players or streamers to learn advanced strategies and techniques. 7. Manage Resources and Positioning Conserve ammo, health packs, and grenades. Use them strategically. Position yourself for advantageous angles and avoid being out in the open. Why Shooting Games Are So Popular Shooting games remain popular for several reasons: Adrenaline Rush: Fast-paced combat and intense action provide an unmatched gaming thrill. Competitive Nature: Multiplayer modes and esports tournaments create a competitive environment for players. Replayability: Shooting games offer endless replay value through challenges, customization, and updates. Social Interaction: Online multiplayer fosters teamwork, communication, and friendships. Skill Development: These games improve hand-eye coordination, reflexes, and decision-making skills. Conclusion: Why Shooting Games Deliver Excitement Shooting games are a cornerstone of the gaming industry, offering action-packed gameplay, immersive graphics, and endless opportunities for competition. Whether you prefer fast-paced battle royale games, tactical FPS matches , or fun arcade shooters, the genre has something for everyone. By mastering your aim, improving movement, and understanding strategies, you can become a top player and enjoy shooting games to the fullest. Ready to jump in? Choose your favorite shooting game, team up with friends, and test your skills on the battlefield. The excitement and challenge of shooting games await you! 뉴스제목: Ethereum Whale Dominance Hits Record High, but Here’s the Risk
본문: The post Ethereum Whale Dominance Hits Record High, but Here’s the Risk appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Ethereum’s whale dominance has reached an all-time high, and this could have significant consequences for the future of the network. While smaller investors hold less than ever, whales—large ETH holders—are quietly increasing their positions. This raises an important question: Is this the beginning of another bull run, or is there something else at play? Whales Are in Control Currently, 104 wallets hold over 100,000 ETH each, making up 57.35% of Ethereum’s total supply—the highest percentage ever recorded. In contrast, mid-sized investors (those holding between 100 and 100,000 ETH) now control just 33.46%, the smallest share in history. Source : Santiment Smaller investors are also seeing their influence shrink. Wallets holding fewer than 100 ETH now account for just 9.19% of the total supply, the smallest proportion since January 2021. This shift has been building since late 2022, when large investors began accumulating more ETH. It’s clear that the whales are positioning themselves for the long term, potentially anticipating a major market shift. A Familiar Pattern: Will History Repeat Itself? This isn’t the first time whale activity has influenced Ethereum’s price. In late 2020 and early 2021, similar whale accumulation sparked a bull run that saw ETH reach new heights. However, there’s also a cautionary tale. When whale dominance peaked in 2022, it was followed by a sharp price correction, reminding us that whale-driven markets can be volatile. A Look at the Technicals Ethereum is currently priced at $4,015, with immediate resistance at $4,109. The 4-hour chart shows the 20-day moving average (MA) at $3,931, while strong support lies at $3,575, backed by the MA 200. Source : Coinglass The technical indicators show cautious optimism. The Relative Strength Index (RSI) stands at 58.42, meaning ETH is not yet in overbought territory. However, the On-Balance Volume (OBV) at -44.94 shows some hesitation among investors. Money In, Money Out: Investor Breakdown Looking at investor behavior, data from IntoTheBlock reveals that 74% of Ethereum holders have held their ETH for over a year, indicating strong confidence in the asset. Short-term holders are divided as follows: 22% bought ETH between 1 month and 12 months ago. 4% are newer investors, having bought in the past month. In terms of profitability, the outlook is positive: 94% of Ethereum holders are in profit. 3% are breaking even. 3% are at a loss, mostly those who bought during Ethereum’s all-time high (ATH) of $4,891 in November 2021. However, around 4.27 million addresses are holding 1.21 million ETH at a loss, with most of these purchases made between $4,093 and $4,891, which is close to the current price. Source : IntoTheBlock Bullish or Risky? What Does This Mean for the Average Investor? So, what does all of this mean for the average investor? There are two possible scenarios. On the bullish side, the whales’ ongoing accumulation points to long-term optimism. If this trend continues, ETH could rise to the $4,500–$5,000 range. However, there’s also a risk. With so much of the supply controlled by a few wallets, the market becomes more vulnerable. A coordinated sell-off by these whales could lead to a sudden price drop. It’s something to keep a close watch on as Ethereum’s future unfolds. In the end, Ethereum whale dominance serves as a reminder that the biggest players still have the most control in this market. Whether this dominance leads to a new bull run or a market correction remains to be seen.

뉴스제목: YoHoHo: The Ultimate Guide to Gameplay, Strategies, and Winning Tips
본문: YoHoHo: The Ultimate Guide to Gameplay, Strategies, and Winning Tips YoHoHo has become one of the most exciting and addictive multiplayer games in recent years. This pirate-themed action game, known for its simple yet competitive gameplay, allows players to fight for treasure, dominate opponents, and become the ultimate pirate. Whether you’re playing solo or competing against friends, YoHoHo combines fast-paced action, strategy, and fun in a unique and colorful pirate world. In this detailed guide, we’ll cover everything you need to know about YoHoHo —from its gameplay and features to the best strategies and winning tips. So, grab your pirate hat and sword, and let’s set sail! What is YoHoHo? YoHoHo is an online multiplayer game where players take on the role of pirates fighting for treasure and dominance. The game revolves around a battle royale-style format , where you must defeat other pirates, collect gold, and grow stronger to outlast your opponents. Designed for simplicity and fun, YoHoHo is accessible to players of all ages. It can be played on browsers , making it popular in schools, offices, and casual gaming environments. Where to Play YoHoHo You can play YoHoHo for free on various platforms: Browser-Based Play: Websites like CrazyGames , Poki , and Miniclip host the game. Mobile Devices: Available for Android and iOS users for gaming on the go. No downloads or installations are required for the browser version—simply visit the site and start playing! YoHoHo Gameplay Mechanics The mechanics of YoHoHo are simple yet engaging, offering quick and competitive matches. Here’s how the game works: 1. Choose Your Pirate Players begin as pirates armed with a basic sword. As you collect gold and defeat opponents, you grow larger and stronger, gaining an advantage in battles. 2. Battle Other Pirates Use your sword to attack other players. The goal is to reduce their health and knock them out of the arena. Avoid getting hit—if your health bar depletes, you’ll lose the match. 3. Collect Gold Scattered throughout the arena are gold coins. Collecting gold increases your pirate’s size and power. The larger you grow, the more dominant you become, making it easier to defeat opponents. 4. Shrinking Arena Similar to a battle royale game, the play area shrinks over time, forcing players into close combat. Stay within the safe zone to avoid losing health and getting eliminated. 5. Upgrade Your Character As you progress, you can unlock new characters with unique abilities and weapons. Gold collected in matches can be used to purchase upgrades or unlock stronger pirates. Key Features of YoHoHo YoHoHo offers a variety of exciting features that make it a fan favorite among casual and competitive gamers: 1. Pirate-Themed Action Play as a pirate and fight for treasure in beautifully designed pirate arenas. 2. Battle Royale Gameplay The shrinking arena forces players into intense battles, testing their reflexes and strategy. 3. Multiplayer Mode Compete against real players online or challenge your friends to private matches. 4. Gold Collection System Collect gold coins to grow stronger, dominate enemies, and climb the leaderboard. 5. Character Upgrades Unlock and upgrade new pirate characters with unique appearances, skills, and weapons. 6. Simple Controls The game features intuitive controls, making it accessible for beginners and casual players. How to Play YoHoHo: Step-by-Step Guide 1. Start the Game Visit a gaming website hosting YoHoHo or download the mobile version. Click “Play” to enter the pirate arena. 2. Use Simple Controls Move your pirate using the arrow keys (on PC) or on-screen joystick (on mobile). Attack by clicking the mouse or tapping the screen. 3. Collect Gold Move around the arena to collect gold coins. The more gold you collect, the larger and stronger you become. 4. Defeat Opponents Attack smaller opponents to eliminate them while avoiding larger, more powerful pirates. Watch your health bar—if it runs out, you’re out of the match! 5. Stay in the Safe Zone The arena shrinks over time, so stay within the safe area to avoid losing health. 6. Grow and Dominate Use your size advantage to take down opponents and dominate the match. The last pirate standing wins! Top Strategies to Win in YoHoHo To become a pirate champion in YoHoHo , you need a mix of strategy, quick reflexes, and smart decision-making. Here are the best tips and strategies to dominate the arena: 1. Focus on Gold Early At the start of the match, focus on collecting as much gold as possible to grow your size. Avoid unnecessary fights until you’re strong enough to take on opponents. 2. Target Smaller Opponents Look for smaller pirates to eliminate early. They are easier to defeat and will help you grow quickly. 3. Avoid Larger Pirates Steer clear of bigger, stronger opponents until you’ve collected enough gold to challenge them. Use your speed to escape dangerous situations. 4. Use the Arena Borders to Your Advantage Push opponents towards the shrinking edges of the arena to eliminate them. Stay in the center of the safe zone to reduce the risk of being trapped. 5. Time Your Attacks Don’t rush into fights. Wait for the right moment to strike when opponents are distracted or weak. 6. Upgrade Your Pirate Use the gold you earn to unlock stronger pirates with better weapons and skills. Upgraded pirates give you a significant advantage in battles. 7. Keep Moving Stay mobile to avoid getting surrounded or attacked. Moving constantly makes you a harder target to hit. Why YoHoHo is So Popular YoHoHo has gained immense popularity for several reasons: 1. Simple Yet Addictive Gameplay The straightforward mechanics make it easy for anyone to pick up and play, while the competitive nature keeps players coming back for more. 2. Fun Pirate Theme The pirate-themed design, characters, and gameplay add a fun and engaging twist to the battle royale genre. 3. Quick Matches Matches are fast-paced and only take a few minutes, making YoHoHo perfect for short gaming sessions during breaks. 4. Free to Play YoHoHo is free to play on browsers and mobile devices, making it accessible to everyone. 5. Multiplayer Thrill Competing against real players worldwide adds excitement and unpredictability to every match. Conclusion: Why You Should Play YoHoHo YoHoHo is a fantastic combination of fun, strategy, and fast-paced action. With its pirate theme, simple controls, and competitive gameplay, the game offers hours of entertainment for players of all ages. Whether you’re aiming to collect the most gold, eliminate opponents, or simply have fun with friends, YoHoHo provides an addictive and rewarding gaming experience. If you haven’t tried YoHoHo yet, set sail today and test your skills in this thrilling pirate battle arena. Remember, only the smartest and strongest pirate will emerge as the ultimate champion. Are you ready to claim your treasure and rule the seas? Play YoHoHo now and become the fiercest pirate in the arena! 뉴스제목: The Hashgraph Group launches $100 million Web3 fund in the UAE
본문: The Hashgraph Group (THG), the Swiss-based international business, venture capital, and technology company, that operates exclusively within the Hedera ecosystem, has secured a fund management license through its subsidiary Hashgraph Ventures Manager Ltd in ADGM UAE. The $100 million global Web3 venture capital fund (Hashgraph Venture Fund) is licensed by the ADGM’s regulatory authority, the Financial Services Regulatory Authority (FSRA). Hashgraph Ventures Manager will make strategic investments in deep-tech companies that are developing innovative solutions in AI, IoT, blockchain/decentralized ledger technology (DLT), robotics, and quantum computing. The Hashgraph Association will seed the fund with $20 million The Hashgraph Association (THA) is seeding the Hashgraph Venture Fund-I (HVF-I) as an anchor investor with USD 20 million, representing 20% of the total fund size. Benefitting companies will have access to THG’s well-established Web3 Venture Studio programs, which actively shape and enable portfolio companies through expertise in engineering, productization, and commercialization. Kamal Youssefi, President of The Hashgraph Association, stated: “We believe in co-funding innovative entrepreneurs and enterprises that are building the next generation of Web3 solutions on Hedera that enable financial inclusion with a positive socioeconomic impact. We look forward to this unique opportunity to gain exposure to leading-edge Web3 companies through investment in Hashgraph Ventures Fund and generating long-term capital growth for the Hedera ecosystem.” THG operates venture studios across Qatar, KSA, and Morocco THG operates globally with a diverse network of government-backed co-investment venture studios, which include the DeepTech Venture Studio signed with the Ministry of Investment of Saudi Arabia (MISA) earlier this year. The studio is worth USD 250M over 5 years. It also operates the Digital Assets Venture Studio in strategic partnership with the Qatar Finance City (QFC), the Web3 Venture Studio with IIT Madras in India, and the DeepTech Venture Studio in strategic partnership with INNOVX in Morocco, alongside various other co-investment partners. The strategic Web3 venture fund in the UAE will focus on generating attractive long-term returns by investing in proven early-stage and well-established companies utilizing deep technologies to build and commercialize enterprise-grade solutions and products for the Web3 economy. Stefan Deiss, Co-Founder & CEO of The Hashgraph Group, said, “We have received a lot of interest in our regulated Web3 ventures fund from existing co-investors and ecosystem partners, including government institutions, sovereign wealth funds, venture capital, family offices, and other institutional investors. With extensive expertise in Web3, we are focused on generating attractive returns through investments in companies that leverage the convergence of deep-tech intersecting on the Hedera DLT network.” From Zero to Web3 Pro: Your 90-Day Career Launch Plan

뉴스제목: Roblox Online: The Ultimate Guide to Playing, Creating, and Exploring in Roblox
본문: Roblox Online: The Ultimate Guide to Playing, Creating, and Exploring in Roblox Roblox Online is one of the most popular gaming platforms in the world, with millions of active users daily. Offering a unique mix of play, creation, and community , Roblox allows players to experience thousands of games, build their virtual worlds, and connect with friends in an immersive online environment. Whether you’re looking for fun, creativity, or social interaction, Roblox Online has something for everyone. In this guide, we’ll cover everything you need to know about Roblox Online—from what it is and how to get started to tips for playing, creating, and exploring the best games available. What is Roblox Online? Roblox Online is a multiplayer online platform where users can create, play, and share games. Developed by Roblox Corporation and launched in 2006 , Roblox has grown into a massive virtual world with millions of user-generated games across every imaginable genre. Roblox is not just a game; it’s a platform where creativity meets community. Players can: Play games: Choose from thousands of games made by developers. Create games: Use Roblox Studio to design and publish games. Socialize: Chat and interact with friends in a shared virtual world. With its endless possibilities, Roblox Online appeals to players of all ages, from kids and teens to adults. How to Play Roblox Online Getting started with Roblox Online is simple. Here’s how to join the platform and start playing: Step 1: Create an Account Visit the Roblox website ( www.roblox.com ) or download the app on your device (PC, Android, iOS, Xbox). Sign up by creating a username, password, and entering your birthday. Customize your avatar to start your journey in Roblox. Step 2: Download Roblox Player Once registered, install the Roblox Player on your device. This software allows you to play games on the platform. Step 3: Explore the Game Library Use the search bar or categories to find games that interest you. Popular genres include: Adventure Games Role-Playing Games (RPGs) Obstacle Courses (Obbys) Battle Royale Games Tycoon and Simulation Games Step 4: Play and Connect Click on a game to join and start playing. You can invite friends or meet other players online. Use the in-game chat to interact with others and make new friends. Key Features of Roblox Online Roblox offers a wide range of features that make it an engaging and dynamic platform: 1. Massive Game Library Roblox has thousands of user-created games in every genre, from adventures to role-playing simulations. 2. Roblox Studio for Game Creation Roblox Studio is a free game development tool that allows players to create their own games. Users can publish games to the Roblox platform and earn rewards through Robux , the in-game currency. 3. Customizable Avatars Personalize your Roblox avatar with clothes, accessories, and animations. Use Robux to unlock premium items and stand out in the virtual world. 4. Social Interaction Connect with friends through chat, messaging, and multiplayer games. Join groups, attend virtual events, and explore social hubs. 5. Cross-Platform Play Play Roblox Online on PC, mobile, tablet, or Xbox, and switch devices seamlessly. 6. Monetization Opportunities Developers can earn real money by creating popular games and selling in-game items using Robux . Top Games to Play on Roblox Online Roblox features thousands of games, but here are some of the most popular titles that have captivated players worldwide: 1. Adopt Me! A role-playing game where you adopt pets, decorate homes, and trade items with friends. 2. Brookhaven RP A social role-playing game that lets you explore a virtual town, drive cars, and live your dream life. 3. Bloxburg A simulation game where you build and manage your dream house while working jobs to earn money. 4. Jailbreak A cops-and-robbers game where you can escape from prison, rob banks, or catch criminals. 5. Tower of Hell A challenging obstacle course game where you race against others to climb to the top of the tower. 6. Arsenal A fast-paced first-person shooter with various weapons and game modes. 7. Murder Mystery 2 A mystery game where you play as the innocent, sheriff, or murderer and solve thrilling puzzles. 8. MeepCity A fun social game where you customize homes, chat with friends, and play mini-games. 9. Piggy A survival horror game where players escape from a villainous character in spooky environments. 10. Royale High A fantasy role-playing game where you attend a virtual high school, dress up, and complete fun tasks. How to Create Your Own Game in Roblox Online Creating your own game on Roblox is one of the most exciting aspects of the platform. Here’s how you can get started: 1. Download Roblox Studio Roblox Studio is a free development tool available to all Roblox users. 2. Choose a Template Use pre-built templates to start designing your game or create one from scratch. 3. Build Your Game World Use drag-and-drop tools to add terrain, buildings, characters, and objects. Customize the environment to bring your ideas to life. 4. Add Scripting Learn Lua programming , the coding language used in Roblox Studio, to add game mechanics and interactions. 5. Test Your Game Test your game to ensure it works smoothly and make necessary adjustments. 6. Publish and Share Publish your game on the Roblox platform for others to play. You can also monetize it by adding paid items or game passes. Tips for Success in Roblox Online Here are some tips to get the most out of your Roblox Online experience: 1. Start with Popular Games Begin by playing highly-rated games to learn the basics and connect with the Roblox community. 2. Earn and Spend Robux Wisely Robux is the in-game currency used to buy items and upgrades. Earn Robux by selling game passes, participating in the Roblox Affiliate Program, or purchasing it with real money. 3. Play with Friends Invite friends to join your favorite games for a more enjoyable and interactive experience. 4. Explore New Games Try out trending games and hidden gems to discover unique gameplay experiences. 5. Be Creative in Roblox Studio Experiment with game design, scripting, and publishing. The more you practice, the better your creations will become. 6. Follow Safety Guidelines Roblox has strong moderation tools, but it’s essential to: Avoid sharing personal information. Report inappropriate content or behavior. Enable parental controls for younger players. Why Roblox Online is Popular Roblox Online’s popularity can be attributed to its unique combination of gaming, creativity, and social interaction : Free-to-Play Access: Roblox is free to play, making it accessible to everyone. Endless Variety: With thousands of games, Roblox offers limitless entertainment options. User-Generated Content: Players can create their own games, fostering creativity and innovation. Community-Centered: Roblox allows players to interact, play, and collaborate with friends worldwide. Cross-Platform Support: Play Roblox on almost any device, from PCs to mobile phones and consoles. Conclusion: Why You Should Play Roblox Online Roblox Online is more than just a gaming platform; it’s a virtual world of endless possibilities. Whether you’re exploring user-generated games, socializing with friends, or designing your dream game in Roblox Studio, Roblox offers a unique experience that appeals to players of all ages. From its creative opportunities to its vast game library, Roblox Online remains one of the most engaging platforms in the gaming world. Start playing today and unlock a universe of fun, creativity, and connection. Dive into Roblox Online now, and let your imagination run wild! 뉴스제목: Ripple Rolls Out Long-Awaited RLUSD Stablecoin Today
본문: Enterprise-focused blockchain Ripple will begin rolling out its long-awaited US Dollar stablecoin on Tuesday, December 17, after receiving approval from the New York Department of Financial Services (NYDFS) last week. The stablecoin will be available to users on the XRP ledger and the Ethereum network. Ripple Announces Launch Of RLUSD Stablecoin The RLUSD stablecoin is Ripple’s attempt to become the go-to network for international payments. It will be available on select crypto exchanges and platforms, including MoonPay, Uphold, Archax, and CoinMENA. Additional listings are planned on Bitso, Bullish, Bitstamp, Mercado Bitcoin, and others. Speaking about the launch, Ripple’s senior vice president of stablecoins, Jack McDonald, said in a recent interview, “Utility is at the forefront, and doing that in a regulated and compliant way is what we’re all about.” According to McDonald, the RLUSD will appeal to those interested in digital assets but averse to the volatility associated with most cryptocurrencies. “Stablecoins are a bit of a hybrid situation, where it walks and talks a lot like a U.S. dollar, but by its nature, is nowhere near as volatile as cryptocurrencies are.” The launch comes after Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse announced that the RLUSD had secured final approval from the New York Department of Financial Services, clearing the way for rolling out the stablecoin for the general public after concluding its testing phase. The RLUSD is fully backed by US Dollar deposits, US government bonds, and cash equivalents, which will help keep its price at $1. The Growing Stablecoin Ecosystem Stablecoins have cemented themselves as one of the most popular types of cryptocurrency and have achieved a market cap of over $200 billion, according to data from CoinGecko. They are popular in countries grappling with high inflation. The stablecoin market is dominated by two major players: Tether’s USDT and Circle’s USDC. Ripple hopes RLUSD will help it compete with both, given stablecoins are quickly becoming a key piece of infrastructure, helping bridge traditional finance and digital markets, acting as liquidity for trading, a medium for blockchain-based transactions, and cross-border payments. Several traditional finance companies, including PayPal, Visa, and Societe Generale, have also entered the stablecoin space as regulators around the world draft guidelines for the asset class. Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse said in a statement, “Early on, Ripple made a deliberate choice to launch our stablecoin under the NYDFS limited purpose trust company charter, widely regarded as the premier regulatory standard worldwide. As the U.S. moves toward clearer regulations, we expect to see greater adoption of stablecoins like RLUSD, which offer real utility and are backed by years of trust and expertise in the industry.” The RLUSD stablecoin will initially be available in the Americas, Asia-Pacific, UK, and the Middle East. Volatility Warning As a stablecoin, the RLUSD aims to maintain a 1:1 peg with the dollar. David Schwartz, Ripple's Chief Technology Officer said it may see unusual volatility due to early demand and limited initial supply. He also added some traders were willing to pay as much as $1200 to purchase a fraction of the stablecoin. “There may be supply shortages in the very early days before the market stabilizes. Please don't FOMO into a stablecoin. This is not an opportunity to get rich.” Additions To Advisory Board Ripple also announced two new additions to its advisory board: Raghuram Rajan, former governor of the Reserve Bank of India, and Kenneth Montgomery, the former first vice president and COO of the Federal Reserve Bank of Boston. Rajan and Montgomery join board members, including Sheila Bair, former chair of the FDIC, and Chris Larsen, co-founder and executive chairman of Ripple. Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

뉴스제목: Metaplanet raises $30 million via zero-interest bonds to grow Bitcoin holdings
본문: Japan-listed company Metaplanet is issuing 4.5 billion yen ($30 million) worth of zero-interest bonds to expand its Bitcoin holdings. This move aligns with its strategy to accumulate the cryptocurrency as a core asset. Metaplanet’s move mirrors MicroStrategy’s widely recognised approach of leveraging corporate reserves to acquire Bitcoin, positioning itself as a Bitcoin-focused business in Japan. The bond issuance comes as the company aims to hedge against the yen’s volatility and Japan’s rising debt levels. Bonds to mature in June 2025 The newly issued bonds are the fourth series in Metaplanet’s financial strategy and carry a zero per cent interest rate. These bonds are set to mature on 16 June 2025, giving the company a defined timeline to execute its Bitcoin purchase strategy while reducing short-term financial pressures. This zero-interest approach allows Metaplanet to optimise its borrowing capacity without incurring additional costs. By lowering its immediate debt burden, the company is focusing on long-term growth opportunities tied to Bitcoin’s potential appreciation . Structured repayment strategy using warrants To ensure financial stability, Metaplanet plans to repay the bonds using funds raised from previously issued warrants. This structured approach highlights the company’s focus on sustainable capital management while offering confidence to its investors. By recycling capital from warrant exercises, Metaplanet balances financial innovation with responsibility. This method not only reduces risks for bondholders but also reflects the company’s commitment to maintaining a clear financial roadmap. This issuance follows an earlier move in which Metaplanet raised 1.75 billion yen ($11.3 million) through one-year ordinary bonds at an annual interest rate of 0.36%. The entire amount was allocated to acquiring Bitcoin, demonstrating the company’s clear commitment to building its BTC reserves. Metaplanet’s Bitcoin buying journey began in April 2024 as part of a broader strategy to hedge against economic uncertainty. So far, the company has accumulated 1,142 BTC, valued at approximately $122.67 million at current market prices. Metaplanet’s Bitcoin hedge Japan’s growing debt levels and the yen’s volatility have driven Metaplanet’s decision to integrate Bitcoin as a reserve asset. By using Bitcoin as a hedge, the company is mitigating risks associated with traditional financial markets and the weakening yen. Metaplanet’s ongoing investments align with the global trend of institutions adopting Bitcoin as a store of value. The move comes at a time when Bitcoin’s market dominance and institutional adoption are on the rise, further solidifying its position in corporate treasuries. Aligning with global Bitcoin strategies Metaplanet’s approach closely resembles MicroStrategy’s strategy of accumulating Bitcoin through debt instruments. MicroStrategy has emerged as a global leader in corporate Bitcoin adoption, holding over 214,000 BTC to date. By issuing bonds to fund Bitcoin purchases, Metaplanet is positioning itself as Japan’s leading corporate adopter of the cryptocurrency. This strategy could attract investor interest, particularly as Bitcoin continues to gain recognition as a viable hedge against inflation and fiat currency risks. With the zero-interest bonds maturing in 2025, Metaplanet has a clear window to strengthen its BTC reserves while minimising short-term financial obligations. As the company aligns with global trends, its Bitcoin-focused strategy positions it as a notable player in Japan’s corporate landscape. 뉴스제목: AI predicts Aave (AAVE) price for year-end
본문: Aave ( AAVE ), the leading decentralized lending protocol, has surged to its highest levels since 2021, reaching a peak of $397 on December 16. Despite a slight pullback to $373 at the press time, the token has rallied an impressive 119% in the past month, pushing its market capitalization to $5.6 billion. With strong tailwinds fueling its growth and challenges beginning to surface, investors are left questioning whether Aave can sustain its momentum and where the token will land as the year draws to a close. AAVE one-month price chart. Source: Finbold What’s driving Aave’s rally Aave’s latest rally is closely tied to the broader cryptocurrency market rebound, with Bitcoin ( BTC ) surging past the $100,000 mark. As investors look for opportunities in decentralized finance ( DeFi ), Aave has emerged as a top choice, outperforming many altcoins with its recent gains. The data from IntoTheBlock supports Aave’s growing dominance in the DeFi lending sector, where it currently holds a commanding 45% market share. This dominance is further emphasized by Aave’s staggering total value locked (TVL), which stands at $23.209 billion, according to DeFiLlama , almost equal to the combined TVL of all major lending protocols. TVL of top 11 lending protocols. Source: DefiLlama Strategic partnerships drive growth Beyond favorable macroeconomic conditions, Aave’s recent partnerships and protocol developments have played a key role in its price surge. The protocol’s planned integration with Linea, a zk-rollup network backed by Consensys, promises improved scalability and lower transaction fees—two crucial factors for attracting new users to DeFi. Adding to the momentum, Aave’s collaboration with Balancer v3 has bolstered liquidity, reinforcing its role as a key pillar of decentralized finance. Meanwhile, the partnership with World Liberty Financial (WLFI) marks another milestone, with Aave v3 now deployed on Ethereum ( ETH ) to enable borrowing and lending for ETH, Wrapped Bitcoin ( WBTC ), and major stablecoins like USDC and USDT . On-chain data further supports AAVE’s bullish momentum. According to Santiment , the decline in Mean Dollar Invested Age (MDIA), an indicator measuring the average age of held tokens, signals that dormant AAVE tokens are re-entering circulation, boosting trading volumes and market activity. Concerns over the Polygon network weigh on Aave Despite its strong performance, Aave faces challenges tied to its exposure to the Polygon (previously MATIC ) PoS chain. Marc Zeller, founder of Aave Chan, has proposed adjustments to mitigate risks linked to bridged assets, citing security concerns reminiscent of past bridge exploits like the Ronin and Harmony hacks. The proposal suggests setting loan-to-value (LTV) ratios to 0% and increasing the reserve factor to 85%, effectively discouraging further deposits or preventing users from borrowing against their collateral. AI prediction: AAVE price to target $400 to $450 by year-end To gauge AAVE’s future potential, Finbold analyzed market data and consulted ChatGPT-4o, which projects the token to close 2024 trading between $400 and $450, depending on market conditions and investor sentiment. Aave’s growing dominance in the DeFi lending sector, supported by strong on-chain activity, a rising total value-locked, and growing partnerships, highlights its solid foundation for further growth. ChatGPT outlook on Aave. Source: ChatGPT/Finbold However, profit-taking activity poses a potential short-term challenge, with corrections remaining on the table. That said, Aave’s market leadership and expansion efforts signal a steady upward trajectory. Its ability to weather headwinds and capitalize on the broader market recovery will determine whether it can hit the upper end of its projected range. Featured image via Shutterstock The post AI predicts Aave (AAVE) price for year-end appeared first on Finbold .

뉴스제목: Crypto can boost economic welfare in underbanked regions | Opinion
본문: Disclosure: The views and opinions expressed here belong solely to the author and do not represent the views and opinions of crypto.news’ editorial. The world’s economy is rapidly evolving, yet financial exclusion remains a persistent issue. A 2022 report by Visa revealed that 2.1 billion people globally remain unserved or underserved by digital financial services. This gap often traps individuals and businesses in underbanked regions in a cycle of limited growth and opportunity. You might also like: Launchpads are the key to decoding crypto’s investment complexity | Opinion The good news? Emerging technologies, especially cryptocurrencies, present an opportunity to rewrite this narrative. Merchant adoption of crypto payments has the potential to significantly uplift the welfare of these underbanked economies. Inflation is crippling cash It is getting harder and harder to rely on cash in economies with significant inflation and price instability. Local currencies have depreciated so much in nations like Argentina, Venezuela, and Zimbabwe that regular cash transactions are fraught with inefficiencies. Stablecoins that are linked to fiat currencies, such as Tether ( USDT ) and USDC ( USDC ), or cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin ( BTC ), can save the day. In enabling safer, peer-to-peer transactions without relying on erratic local currencies, crypto can help businesses protect their revenue value. Crypto payments are less susceptible to the inflation rates that cause cash to depreciate. This is invaluable to regions in which central banks struggle to preserve economic stability. The shift is already evident. According to a 2022 Deloitte survey , 93% of merchants accepting crypto reported positive impacts on customer engagement and satisfaction metrics. As more merchants recognize that crypto allows them to offer more efficient transactions, consumer trust is enhanced. In the long term, this galvanizes more sustainable economic activity. Crypto payments: An interconnected future for merchants and cross-border transactions Rising rates of crypto adoption among merchants are also bolstering cross-border growth. Crypto’s ability to provide reduced rates and faster settlement times is starting to make traditional SWIFT-based banking systems appear all the more archaic. Smaller businesses, in particular, can trade more effectively with the help of cryptocurrency payments, swerving excessive fees and reducing the risk of volatile exchange rates. Additionally, decentralized currencies can guarantee transparent financial transactions and minimize corruption, which is essential for economic stability in lower-income areas. The resulting shift toward crypto ultimately leads to the expansion of local commerce, which has an inevitable, favorable impact on the wider economy. Micropayments: A game-changer for financial inclusion The willingness to accept crypto also opens up a largely untapped opportunity to promote financial inclusion. In underbanked regions, where daily income might be as low as a few dollars, traditional banking fees render small transactions impractical. Cryptocurrencies, however, enable frictionless micropayments with minimal fees, unlocking a new frontier for commerce. If farmers, for example, can sell produce in small increments without losing significant revenue to transaction costs, profit margins increase and consequently create strong financial activity in local economies. Similarly, crypto gives service providers, like ride-share drivers or local artisans, the opportunity to receive smaller payments instantly and directly, bypassing middlemen. This embeds a sense of fluidity into the fabric of day-to-day transactions. As crypto is more widely adopted, it will also become more feasible for things such as pay-as-you-go household utilities to be dealt with in micropayments. This can eradicate the need to pay large, up-front, unaffordable costs in communities that struggle to stay above the breadline. In this sense, crypto-powered micropayments have the potential to change lives. Businesses in emerging and developing markets serve an underbanked yet youthful and tech-savvy population, creating a unique opportunity for innovative payment solutions. While mobile money has played a transformative role in bridging the financial gap for the unbanked, cryptocurrencies present an even more powerful and convenient alternative. By offering greater accessibility, lower transaction costs, and borderless capabilities, cryptocurrencies empower businesses to serve this demographic with seamless, reliable, and inclusive financial services. For these markets, crypto adoption could redefine financial ecosystems and accelerate economic participation. Key considerations for payment solution providers While the promise of crypto is undeniable, it’s not a one-size-fits-all solution. It’s crucial that payment providers address several key factors when developing systems tailored to underbanked regions. For a start, solutions must be designed with inclusivity in mind. Many underbanked individuals lack access to sophisticated technology, so systems should work seamlessly on basic smartphones or even feature phones. User interfaces must be intuitive to encourage widespread adoption. Tied to this is the need to facilitate adequate awareness with educational resources. Crypto can seem intimidating to first-time users. Payment providers should invest in educating both merchants and customers on how crypto works, how to leverage its benefits, and how to navigate risks truly. Financial literacy campaigns will play a critical role in building trust and widespread adoption from both merchants and consumers. Regulatory compliance is also a challenge that needs careful navigation. Operating in underbanked regions can be a complex process in this regard. Providers must work closely with governments to ensure compliance while advocating for clear, supportive policies that enable innovation. Above all, security is paramount. Providers must implement robust fraud prevention measures. Hacks and the fear they perpetuate among new users are often a primary cause for slow adoption and severely undermine any progression of trust. Final thoughts The integration of cryptocurrencies into merchant ecosystems in underbanked regions is more than just a technological shift—it’s an opportunity to drive economic welfare and foster inclusion. Cryptocurrency payments have the potential to be a potent equalizer in the global economy by resolving the shortcomings of conventional payment systems, enabling companies to conduct business internationally, and helping people avoid the traps of cash dependence. However, cooperation between local communities, governments, and payment solution providers is essential to success. The adoption of cryptocurrency payments has the potential to become a major component of financial inclusion for billions of people globally, surpassing the status of a specialized trend with the correct tactics. Read more: Blockchain and smart contracts revolutionize urban development | Opinion Author: Meryem Habibi Meryem Habibi is the chief revenue officer of Bitpace. With an extensive background in marketing, communications, and sales within the fintech industry, Meryem brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table. Having worked with industry giants such as Samsung and Diebold Nixdorf, Meryem has collaborated at the board level on strategy development, revenue stream diversification, risk management, and unlocking growth opportunities in emerging markets. Meryem is passionate about delivering seamless, user-friendly products to an increasingly progressive and groundbreaking industry. With her dedication and experience, she plays a pivotal role in driving Bitpace towards its goals of innovation and success.

뉴스제목: Shiba Inu-Related Project Introduces a Special Airdrop: Details
본문: TL;DR Shifu, a new meme coin in the Shiba Inu ecosystem, has a total supply of 100 billion tokens, with 30% allocated for a community airdrop. Despite the effort, SHIB’s valuation remains stable at $0.00002733. However, a 240% surge in large transaction volume and Shibarium’s rapid progress could boost the asset’s utility and drive future price increases. The Terms and Conditions Shifu – a new meme coin project introduced by the Shiba Inu ecosystem – launched an airdrop exclusively for the SHIB community. The total supply of SHIFU is 100,000,000,000 coins. The project revealed that 30% of that amount will be allocated for the community airdrop, with 50% unlocked during the Token Generation Event (TGE) and the rest released in the next four weeks. The team will require a snapshot from eligible users, but the final deadline has not yet been announced . It is important to note that 22,000,000,000 SHIFU tokens will be distributed to some of those holding at least 100,000 SHIB and 100 BUBBLE. 2,000,000,000 SHIFU will be allocated to eligible LEASH holders, while lucky BONE owners will receive 1,000,000,000 SHIFU. The remaining 4,000,000,000 tokens are meant to reach the BUBBLE community. The team added that 70% of the total supply (70 billion SHIFU) will be distributed for other purposes. 40 billion tokens will go to the “liquidity and public pre-sale” section, 20 billion will reach treasury, whereas 10 billion will fund marketing initiatives. SHIFU is a dog-themed meme coin that has yet to go live. Earlier this month, the popular X user Lark Davis described it as “the master of all,” highlighting its legitimacy due to its connection with Shiba Inu’s developers. SHIB Price Outlook The announced airdrop seems to have caused little-to-no price volatility for the second-largest meme coin. SHIB is up a mere 1.5% in the last 24 hours, currently trading at around $0.00002733. Its market capitalization remains hovering at approximately $16 billion, making the asset the 15th-biggest in the entire crypto sector. SHIB Price, Source: CoinGecko On the other hand, some important metrics suggest that Shiba Inu may experience a much more substantial increase in the near future . One of those is the large transaction volume (where each SHIB transaction is greater than $100,000). According to IntoTheBlock, the figure has soared by 240% on a daily scale , reaching $175 million. Such a spike might be interpreted positively by traders, driving further demand for SHIB and pushing the price upward. Shibarium’s progress is also worth mentioning. The layer-2 scaling solution has been processing millions of transactions in the past several days, blasting through numerous milestones. Shibarium’s advancement can have a notable impact on SHIB’s valuation due to its role in improving the utility, adoption, and efficiency of the entire ecosystem. The post Shiba Inu-Related Project Introduces a Special Airdrop: Details appeared first on CryptoPotato .

뉴스제목: Flipster and OverProtocol Announce Partnership with $200,000 USDT Giveaway
본문: Warsaw, Poland, December 17th, 2024, Chainwire Flipster, a fast-growing crypto exchange, has announced a collaboration with OverProtocol, a layer 1 blockchain, to launch an exclusive Flipster x OverProtocol campaign that features the OVER Launchpool and social media giveaway , offering users a combined prize pool of 200,000 USDT. CEO of Flipster, commented, “We are proud to partner with OverProtocol, whose mission to create the world’s most decentralized and accessible network reflects our commitment to driving crypto ecosystem growth. By offering opportunities such as the OVER Launchpool, we’re making crypto more accessible, empowering our community to earn rewards, and helping to pave the way toward a more inclusive global economy.” In the OVER Launchpool , Flipster users can stake OVER to earn daily USDT rewards from a 190,000 USDT rewards pool, and increase their earnings further by unlocking tiered reward multipliers. The earlier and longer users stake, the more USDT rewards they can earn. An additional 10,000 USDT prize pool awaits users who follow Flipster on X to join the social media giveaway. By completing simple tasks on Zealy , participants become eligible for rewards, with 200 lucky winners receiving 50 USDT each. Ben (Jaeyun) Kim, founder of the Over Foundation, added, “Our collaboration with Flipster focuses on delivering tangible, reward-driven opportunities that enhance user engagement. Together with Flipster, we aim to accelerate the transition toward a more interconnected digital economy.” For more information, users can visit the Flipster x OverProtocol Partnership page. This campaign is available only to users in eligible regions. Users can refer to Flipster's Country Restrictions for more details. About Flipster Flipster is one of the fastest-growing cryptocurrency exchanges, offering both futures and spot trading to traders globally. It supports users in capitalizing on market opportunities with ease. Especially known for its lightning-fast perpetual futures listings, Flipster offers 250+ crypto futures pairs tradable with up to 100x leverage with zero trading fees, high liquidity, and narrow spreads. Core products include: Earn Campaign : High APR rewards of up to 22% by depositing USDT, BTC, or ETH. Launchpool : Daily USDT rewards through staking, with additional rewards through task-based multipliers. Airdrops﻿: Crypto rewards from new and popular crypto projects by completing missions. Flipster also offers a range of programs for VIPs , Referrals , and Affiliates . For the latest updates, users can follow Flipster on X . About OverProtocol OverProtocol is a Layer 1 blockchain that lets individuals run full nodes on their personal computers. With the OverScape app, anyone can participate as a validator without special knowledge. By reducing reliance on institutional validators, OverProtocol offers new financial opportunities and aims to create a stable, global P2P financial network. Users can validate transactions and propose blocks, earning native OVER tokens as rewards. ContactBrand Marketing ManagerShirlyn TanFlipsterpr@flipster.io Disclaimer: This is a sponsored press release and is for informational purposes only. It does not reflect the views of Crypto Daily, nor is it intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, or financial advice.

뉴스제목: ESMA Publishes Final Guidance on MiCA Implementation Days Before Deadline
본문: The European Securities and Markets Authority (ESMA) has released its final guidance on Tuesday to help member states implement the impending rules.  ESMA published its final report on reverse solicitation, systems, what crypto may constitute as a financial instrument and draft technical standards on market abuse prevention.  The European Union's Markets in Crypto Asset (MiCA) rules - bespoke rules for the crypto sector - are meant to come into force by December 30 across the bloc of 27 nations. But some countries are yet to put in place legislation to implement MiCA.  Portugal's central bank even told CoinDesk on Monday that it is yet to figure out which national competent authority will be responsible for the rules since legislation has not passed.  A part of what caused delays for national competent authorities was the short period between ESMA releasing its final technical standards in October and the implementation date, industry trade associations told CoinDesk.  "Looking ahead, as the transitional period progresses, we will continue to provide guidance and work with all [National Competent Authorities] NCAs to ensure the smooth implementation of MiCA and to support a level playing field through supervisory convergence actions,” Verena Ross, ESMA Chair, said.  Read more: EU Countries Struggle to Implement MiCA as Deadline for Crypto Regulatory Revamp Looms

뉴스제목: What is ISO 20022 compliance for crypto coins? – Is it a ‘must have’ for crypto adoption?
본문: ISO 20022 compliance is widely known as the revolutionary global financial messaging standard for digital currencies. A global standard means that crypto will be recognized everywhere, but is this move a necessary step for crypto adoption? Or does it undermine the very principles on which cryptocurrencies were built? Cryptocurrencies have long existed outside the mainstream financial system, with their decentralized, peer-to-peer models offering a stark contrast to the traditional, centralized banking system. However, as these assets evolve, there’s a growing interest in integrating them into global financial infrastructures. Financial authorities seem to agree that the best way for traditional financial institutions to find it easy to adopt cryptos is to employ a regulatory standard, which led to the ISO 20022. The basics of ISO 20022 ISO 20022 is a financial messaging standard designed to provide a secure and standardized way for organizations to exchange financial information. It was introduced by the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) to replace the outdated SWIFT system used by banks and financial institutions for global payments. While the standard was initially developed for traditional finance, its potential to serve the evolving digital currency market is now being explored . A key issue that ISO 20022 seeks to address is the lack of Digital Token Identifiers (DTIs), which are crucial for distinguishing between different digital currencies. Unlike fiat currencies such as the U.S. dollar or the euro, cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Bitcoin Cash lack universally recognized identifiers, making them difficult for banks to track and process. For example, while a bank’s system can easily identify transactions involving USD or AUD, it struggles to differentiate between transactions involving Bitcoin and Bitcoin Cash. ISO 20022 proposes a solution by introducing a standardized language for digital currencies. This will make it easier for financial institutions to facilitate cross-border payments involving cryptocurrencies. This global standard promises to improve efficiency and reduce errors while ensuring better regulatory compliance, transparency, and fraud protection. Cryptocurrencies adopting ISO 20022 As reported by Cryptopolitan, cryptocurrencies that have embraced the standard include XRP, Stellar, Quant, Hedera, IOTA, XDC, Cardano, and Algorand. These tokens now benefit from a higher degree of interoperability with traditional financial institutions. According to economists, the inclusion of these tokens in the ISO 20022 compliant list positions them as legitimate players in the global financial system, able to communicate seamlessly with banks and other financial organizations. For financial institutions, ISO 20022 compliance means more than just a technical upgrade. It enables seamless communication and ensures compliance with tightening global regulations. As most financial authorities are increasingly cracking down on the cryptocurrency industry, the ability to meet regulatory standards and provide detailed reporting is an imperative selling point. Cryptocurrencies that are ISO 20022 compliant have an edge in this regard, as the protocol’s rich data capabilities help institutions better track and report transactions. Feasibility of applying ISO 20022 to tokens The adoption of ISO 20022 by cryptocurrencies isn’t as straightforward as some may believe. While companies can adhere to the ISO 20022 standard, it doesn’t mean that the blockchain or the token itself is inherently compliant. This distinction is important because, at the protocol level, many cryptocurrencies still operate outside the scope of ISO 20022. The system doesn’t automatically recognize digital tokens as compliant, so companies and projects must voluntarily integrate these standards into their systems. ISO 20022’s role is primarily in the messaging layer rather than in altering digital currencies’ fundamental blockchain structure. This means that while ISO 20022-compliant cryptocurrencies can communicate more seamlessly with traditional financial networks, their underlying decentralized nature remains unchanged. ISO 20022 is an international standard for electronic data interchange between financial institutions and XRP is a digital asset that aligns with these standards. ISO 20022 is a messaging standard that enables interoperability and data exchange in banking systems* #ISO20022 #XRP pic.twitter.com/kZ3JoJXvio — NICEToken (@NICEToken12345) December 17, 2024 The reality is that many tokens still lack the infrastructure required to fully support ISO 20022. For developers, complying with the protocol is a complex process. The importance of ISO 20022 for crypto adoption ISO 20022 compliance could play a crucial role in advancing crypto adoption, but it’s not a panacea. The integration of cryptocurrencies into traditional financial networks offers benefits that can’t be ignored. So if you don’t know about #ISO20022 recommend DYOR time is ticking and eventually very soon the average person will not be able to afford them I’m just a messenger carry on about the drones but don’t say I ain’t warn you $XRP $XLM $XDC $ALGO $IOTA $HBAR pic.twitter.com/cTQQB4lg5X — Trump’sBlackNephew🐸 (@45sBullishAnon) December 16, 2024 Chief among the perks is the legitimacy ISO 20022 brings to the tokens that adopt it. When cryptocurrencies adhere to a globally recognized standard, they’re no longer seen as fringe or rogue entities but as legitimate assets capable of participating in the global financial system. This sense of legitimacy could go a long way in reducing the skepticism surrounding cryptocurrencies, especially among institutional investors. The transition from a decentralized, unregulated space to one that operates within recognized financial frameworks has the potential to foster trust ; a key barrier to widespread adoption. “ We need to take the standards we have today and update them to ensure interoperability across countries’ recognized digital currency systems. This will be the first step towards universal acceptance. Trust is paramount: without that, all the technology in the world is not going to provide the answer ,” said retired Chairman of the Central Intelligence Agency Cryptographic Center Edward Scheidt. Yet, the very concept of ISO 20022 raises fundamental questions about the essence of cryptocurrency. Many early crypto adopters sought to create a system that operated outside of traditional financial institutions. The desire for decentralization and self-governance was central to the creation of Bitcoin and similar projects. To some crypto enthusiasts, the adoption of a globally recognized standard like ISO 20022 may seem like a step backward. It may undermine the decentralized ethos that cryptocurrencies were designed to uphold. Will ISO 20022 affect the price of compliant coins? Another important question surrounding ISO 20022 compliance is whether it will have a measurable impact on the price of compliant cryptocurrencies. The answer is far from straightforward, but the evidence suggests that it could influence the value of these coins, particularly in terms of mainstream acceptance. As cryptocurrencies become more integrated into the global financial system, the perceived stability and security of compliant tokens may make them more attractive to institutional investors. ISO 20022 compliance is expected to reduce the risks associated with digital assets, making them more appealing to larger financial players. This could, in turn, drive up demand for compliant tokens, potentially boosting their value. However, it’s worth noting that the broader cryptocurrency market operates on sentiment, and various factors contribute to price fluctuations. While compliance with ISO 20022 may enhance the credibility of certain cryptocurrencies, it’s unlikely to be a “big” factor in driving their price movements. The current ISO 20022 compliant coins’ prices were not significantly affected when they were first listed, so it could be reaching for the stars to think it will affect their values in the long term. ISO 20022: Crypto’s adoption and the future of decentralization ISO 20022 compliance offers a promising pathway for cryptocurrencies seeking integration into the global financial system. The standard’s potential to bring legitimacy, regulatory compliance, and enhanced transparency to the crypto market cannot be denied. However, the adoption of this protocol raises important questions about the future of decentralized finance. For now, it remains clear that ISO 20022 compliance isn’t an all-or-nothing proposition. While it offers tangible benefits to the cryptocurrencies that adopt it, it also serves as a reminder of the ongoing struggle between crypto’s founding principles and its integration into the global financial system. The journey toward broader adoption will require both financial regulators and crypto developers to carefully consider the benefits and the philosophical forces at play.
